" </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁Sih oni ▁hak um ruh usu ▁Israeli ▁ap ite ▁katika ▁nchi ▁yake . ▁Ali lik utan isha ▁j eshi ▁lake ▁lote , ▁waka ondoka ▁kwenda ▁jang wani ▁ili ▁kup igana ▁na ▁Israeli . ▁Ali po fika ▁huko ▁Ya hazi , ▁akap igana ▁na ▁Israeli . </s> swh_Latn

▁Israeli ▁aka iteka ▁miji ▁yote ▁ya ▁Wa am ori ▁na ▁ku ika lia , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁H esh boni ▁na ▁maka zi ▁yote ▁yanayo iz unguka . </s> swh_Latn

▁Hivi ▁ndivyo ▁vitu o ▁katika ▁safari ▁ya ▁Waisraeli ▁walip otoka ▁Misri ▁kwa ▁vik osi ▁chini ▁ya ▁u ongozi ▁wa ▁Mose ▁na ▁Aroni . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁agi zo ▁la ▁Bwana , ▁Mose ▁ali weka ▁kumb ukumbu ▁ya ▁vitu o ▁katika ▁safari ▁yao . ▁Hivi ▁ndivyo ▁vitu o ▁katika ▁safari ▁yao : </s> swh_Latn
▁Waisraeli ▁walisa firi ▁kutoka ▁R ames esi ▁katika ▁siku ▁ya ▁kumi ▁na ▁tano ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wa ▁kwanza , ▁siku ▁iliyo fuata ▁Pas aka . ▁W alit embea ▁kwa ▁u jasiri ▁wazi ▁mbele ▁ya ▁W amis ri ▁wote , </s> swh_Latn
▁waliokuwa ▁wak iz ika ▁wa zaliwa ▁wao ▁wa ▁kwanza ▁wote , ▁ambao ▁Bwana ▁alikuwa ▁ame wa ua ▁katikati ▁yao , ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁Bwana ▁alikuwa ▁am ele ta ▁hukumu ▁juu ▁ya ▁mi ungu ▁yao . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waisraeli ▁wali ondoka ▁R ames esi ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Suk othi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Suk othi ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Eth amu , ▁pembeni ▁mwa ▁jang wa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Eth amu , ▁wak age uka ▁wak aru di ▁Pi - H ahir othi , ▁hadi ▁mashar iki ▁ya ▁Baal - S ef oni , ▁wak api ga ▁kambi ▁yao ▁karibu ▁na ▁Mig doli . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Pi - H ahir othi ▁wak apita ▁katikati ▁ya ▁bahari ▁mpaka ▁jang wani , ▁na ▁baada ▁ya ▁kusa firi ▁kwa ▁siku ▁tatu ▁katika ▁J angwa ▁la ▁Eth amu , ▁wali piga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Mara . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Mara ▁waka enda ▁E limu , ▁mahali ▁ambapo ▁pa likuwa ▁na ▁chem ch emi ▁kumi ▁na ▁mbili ▁na ▁mit ende ▁sab ini , ▁huko ▁wak api ga ▁kambi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁E limu ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁k ando ▁ya ▁Bah ari ▁ya ▁Sh amu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁k ando ▁ya ▁Bah ari ▁ya ▁Sh amu ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁katika ▁J angwa ▁la ▁Sini . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁katika ▁J angwa ▁la ▁Sini , ▁wak api ga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Do fka . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Do fka , ▁wak api ga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Al ushi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Al ushi , ▁wak api ga ▁kambi ▁Ref id imu , ▁mahali ▁ambapo ▁hap akuwa ▁na ▁maji ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁watu ▁kunywa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Ref id imu ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁katika ▁J angwa ▁la ▁Sinai . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁katika ▁J angwa ▁la ▁Sinai ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Kib r oth - H ataa va . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Kib r oth - H ataa va ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Has er othi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Has er othi ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁R ith ma . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁R ith ma ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁R imon - Per esi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁R imon - Per esi ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Lib na . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Lib na ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁R isa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁R isa ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Ke he latha . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Ke he latha ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁kwenye ▁m lima ▁She feri . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁kwenye ▁m lima ▁She feri ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Har ada . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Har ada ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Mak el othi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Mak el othi ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Ta hathi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Ta hathi ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Tera . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Tera ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁M ith ka . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁M ith ka ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Hash mona . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Hash mona ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁Mos er othi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Mos er othi ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Bene - Yak ani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Bene - Yak ani ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Hor - H ag id g adi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Hor - H ag id g adi ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Y ot batha . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Y ot batha ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Abr ona . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Abr ona ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁E sion - G eb eri . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁E sion - G eb eri ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁K ades hi ▁katika ▁J angwa ▁la ▁Sini . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁K ades hi ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁kwenye ▁M lima ▁Hori , ▁mp ak ani ▁mwa ▁Ed omu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁amri ▁ya ▁Bwana , ▁ku hani ▁Aroni ▁ali panda ▁M lima ▁Hori , ▁mahali ▁alipo fia ▁katika ▁siku ▁ya ▁kwanza ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wa ▁tano , ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁aro ba ini ▁baada ▁ya ▁Waisraeli ▁kutoka ▁Misri . </s> swh_Latn
▁Aroni ▁aliku fa ▁juu ▁ya ▁M lima ▁Hori ▁akiwa ▁na ▁umri ▁wa ▁miaka ▁12 3. </s> swh_Latn
▁Mfalme ▁M kana ani ▁wa ▁Ar adi , ▁ambaye ▁ali ishi ▁huko ▁N ege bu ▁ya ▁Kana ani , ▁akas ikia ▁kwamba ▁Waisraeli ▁wan akuja . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁kwenye ▁m lima ▁Hori ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Sal mona . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Sal mona , ▁wak api ga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Pun oni . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Pun oni , ▁wak api ga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Ob othi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Ob othi , ▁wak api ga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Iye - Abar imu , ▁mi pak ani ▁mwa ▁Mo abu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Iye - Abar imu , ▁wak api ga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁D ibon - G adi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁D ibon - G adi ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁huko ▁Al mon - D ib latha imu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁Al mon - D ib latha imu ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁katika ▁mili ma ▁ya ▁Abar imu , ▁karibu ▁na ▁Nebo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ondoka ▁kwenye ▁mili ma ▁ya ▁Abar imu ▁na ▁kupiga ▁kambi ▁kwenye ▁tamb ar are ▁ya ▁Mo abu , ▁k ando ▁ya ▁Yord ani ▁ng ʼ ambo ▁ya ▁Yeriko . </s> swh_Latn
▁H uko ▁kwenye ▁tamb ar are ▁za ▁Mo abu ▁wali piga ▁kambi ▁kand ok ando ▁ya ▁M to ▁Yord ani , ▁kuan zia ▁Beth - Yes him othi ▁mpaka ▁Abel - S hit imu . </s> swh_Latn

▁M taim iliki ▁nchi ▁hiyo ▁na ▁kukaa ▁huko , ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁nime wap eni ▁ninyi ▁ku im iliki . </s> swh_Latn
▁M ta iga wanya ▁nchi ▁hiyo ▁kwa ▁kupiga ▁kura , ▁kufu atana ▁na ▁koo ▁zenu . ▁Kwa ▁kundi ▁kubwa ▁zaidi ▁toa ▁ur ithi ▁mkubwa ▁zaidi , ▁na ▁kwa ▁kundi ▁dogo ▁zaidi ▁ur ithi ▁mdogo ▁zaidi . ▁Cho cho te ▁kinacho wa ang ukia ▁kwa ▁kura ▁kit akuwa ▁chao . ▁M ta iga wanya ▁nchi ▁kufu atana ▁na ▁maka bila ▁ya ▁babu ▁zenu . </s> swh_Latn

▁" Wa agize ▁Waisraeli ▁kuwa pa ▁Wala wi ▁miji ▁ya ▁kuishi ▁kutoka ▁ur ithi ▁ambao ▁Waisraeli ▁wata um iliki . ▁W ape ▁maeneo ▁ya ▁mal isho ▁kuz unguka ▁hiyo ▁miji . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁wat akuwa ▁na ▁miji ▁ya ▁kuishi ▁na ▁maeneo ▁ya ▁mal isho ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁ng ʼ ombe ▁zao , ▁mbu zi , ▁kondo o ▁na ▁mif ugo ▁yao ▁ming ine ▁yote . </s> swh_Latn

▁Nje ▁ya ▁mji , ▁p ima ▁mita ▁900 ▁upande ▁wa ▁mashar iki , ▁upande ▁wa ▁kusini ▁mita ▁900 , ▁upande ▁wa ▁mag haribi ▁mita ▁900 , ▁na ▁upande ▁wa ▁kas kazini ▁mita ▁900 , ▁na ▁mji ▁utakuwa ▁katikati . ▁Ene o ▁hili ▁lit akuwa ▁lao ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁mal isho . </s> swh_Latn

▁cha gu eni ▁baadhi ▁ya ▁miji ▁iwe ▁miji ▁yenu ▁ya ▁makim bili o , ▁ambayo ▁mtu ▁ambaye ▁ame ua ▁mwen zake ▁bila ▁kukus udia ▁a weza ▁kuk imbi lia ▁humo . </s> swh_Latn
▁It akuwa ▁mahali ▁pa ▁kuk imbi lia ▁kutoka ▁mli pi za ▁kis asi , ▁ili ▁kwamba ▁mtu ▁ali yes ht akiwa ▁kwa ▁maua ji ▁asi fe ▁kabla ▁ya ▁kuj itete a ▁mbele ▁ya ▁mkutano . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mi ji ▁hii ▁sita ▁m tak ayo itoa ▁itakuwa ▁miji ▁yenu ▁ya ▁makim bili o . </s> swh_Latn

▁Mi ji ▁hii ▁sita ▁itakuwa ▁mahali ▁pa ▁makim bili o ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁Waisraeli , ▁wag eni ▁na ▁watu ▁wengine ▁wanao ishi ▁katikati ▁yenu , ▁ili ▁kwamba ▁mtu ▁yeyote ▁ambaye ▁ame ua ▁mtu ▁mwingine ▁pasi po ▁kukus udia ▁awe ze ▁kuk imbi lia ▁humo . </s> swh_Latn

▁Kisha ▁um wamb ie ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wako : ▁" N ime ondoa ▁katika ▁nyumba ▁yangu ▁ile ▁sehemu ▁iliyo wekwa ▁wak fu ▁na ▁nim empa ▁M la wi , ▁mg eni , ▁yat ima ▁na ▁mj ane , ▁kulingana ▁na ▁yote ▁uli yo am uru . ▁Si ja zi halifu ▁amri ▁zako ▁wala ▁kusa hau ▁hata ▁moja wapo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Si jala ▁sehemu ▁iliyo wekwa ▁wak fu ▁wakati ▁nilip okuwa ▁niki ombo leza , ▁wala ▁sija ondoa ▁moja wapo ▁wakati ▁nilip okuwa ▁naj isi , ▁wala ▁si j atoa ▁sehemu ▁yake ▁yoyote ▁kwa ▁wafu . ▁Nim em tii ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wangu ; ▁nime fanya ▁kila ▁kitu ▁u lich oni am uru . </s> swh_Latn
▁Anga lia ▁chini ▁kutoka ▁mbinguni , ▁mas kani ▁yako ▁mat akatifu , ▁uwa bar iki ▁watu ▁wako ▁Israeli ▁pamoja ▁na ▁nchi ▁u liy otu pa ▁kama ▁uli vyo ah idi ▁kwa ▁kia po ▁kwa ▁baba ▁zetu , ▁nchi ▁inay otir irika ▁ma ziwa ▁na ▁asali . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wako ▁an aku agiza ▁leo ▁kufuata ▁amri ▁hizi ▁na ▁sheria ; ▁zish ike ▁kwa ▁bidii ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wako ▁wote ▁na ▁kwa ▁roho ▁yako ▁yote . </s> swh_Latn
▁U met angaza ▁leo ▁kwamba ▁Bwana ▁ndiye ▁Mungu ▁wako ▁na ▁kwamba ▁uta fuata ▁njia ▁zake , ▁kwamba ▁uta y ashika ▁maag izo ▁yake , ▁amri ▁zake ▁na ▁sheria ▁zake ▁nawe ▁ut am tii . </s> swh_Latn
▁Naye ▁Bwana ▁amet angaza ▁leo ▁kwamba ▁ninyi ▁ni ▁taifa ▁lake , ▁haz ina ▁yake ▁ya ▁thamani ▁kama ▁alivyo ah idi , ▁ili ▁kwamba ▁mpate ▁kuy ashika ▁maag izo ▁yake ▁yote . </s> swh_Latn
▁Am et angaza ▁kwamba ▁atawa weka ▁juu ▁kuliko ▁mataifa ▁mengine ▁ali yoya fanya ▁katika ▁sifa , ▁kuwa ▁fa hari ▁na ▁heshima , ▁na ▁kwamba ▁mt akuwa ▁taifa ▁takatifu ▁kwa ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wenu , ▁kama ▁alivyo ah idi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mose ▁na ▁wazee ▁wa ▁Israeli ▁waka wa agiza ▁watu : ▁" Y ash ik eni ▁maag izo ▁haya ▁yote ▁nin ayo wa agiza ▁leo . </s> swh_Latn
▁M tak ap okuwa ▁mme vuka ▁M to ▁Yord ani ▁na ▁kuingia ▁katika ▁nchi ▁awa p ayo ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wenu , ▁msim amis he ▁mawe ▁makubwa ▁na ▁mk ay atie ▁li pu . </s> swh_Latn
▁And ik eni ▁juu ▁yake ▁maneno ▁yote ▁ya ▁sheria ▁hii ▁wakati ▁m tak ap okuwa ▁mme vuka ▁na ▁kuingia ▁katika ▁nchi ▁awa p ayo ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wenu , ▁nchi ▁itir irik ayo ▁ma ziwa ▁na ▁asali , ▁kama ▁vile ▁Bwana , ▁Mungu ▁wa ▁baba ▁zenu , ▁alivyo wa ah idi . </s> swh_Latn
▁M tak ap okuwa ▁mme vuka ▁Yord ani , ▁sim am isheni ▁mawe ▁haya ▁juu ▁ya ▁M lima ▁E bali , ▁kama ▁nina vyo wa agiza ▁leo , ▁mk ay atie ▁li pu . </s> swh_Latn
▁H uko ▁mj enge eni ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wenu ▁mad haba hu , ▁mad haba hu ▁ya ▁mawe . ▁M sit umie ▁ki faa ▁chochote ▁cha ▁chuma ▁juu ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁J engeni ▁mad haba hu ▁ya ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁mawe ▁ya ▁sh ambani , ▁na ▁m toe ▁sadaka ▁za ▁kut ekete zwa ▁juu ▁yake ▁kwa ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wenu . </s> swh_Latn

▁Uta bar ikiwa ▁mjini ▁na ▁uta bar ikiwa ▁mash ambani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Uta bar ikiwa ▁uza o ▁wa ▁tum bo ▁lako , ▁na ▁ma zao ▁ya ▁nchi ▁yako ▁na ▁wanyama ▁wako ▁wach anga ▁wa ▁kuf ugwa , ▁yaani ▁nd ama ▁wa ▁mak undi ▁yako ▁ya ▁ng ʼ ombe , ▁na ▁wana - k ondo o ▁wa ▁mak undi ▁yako . </s> swh_Latn

▁Bwana ▁at asa babisha ▁ad ui ▁wain uka o ▁dhidi ▁yako ▁kus hind wa ▁mbele ▁yako . ▁Wat aku jia ▁kwa ▁njia ▁moja ▁lakini ▁watak imbia ▁mbele ▁yako ▁kwa ▁njia ▁saba . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁ata agiza ▁baraka ▁juu ▁ya ▁g hala ▁zako ▁na ▁juu ▁ya ▁kila ▁kitu ▁ut aka ch og usa ▁kwa ▁mkono ▁wako . ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wako ▁atak ub ariki ▁katika ▁nchi ▁anay oku pa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁at aku fanya ▁kuwa ▁taifa ▁lake ▁takatifu , ▁kama ▁ali vy ok uah idi ▁kwa ▁kia po , ▁kama ▁uk ishika ▁maag izo ▁ya ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wako ▁na ▁kwenda ▁katika ▁njia ▁zake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁mataifa ▁yote ▁ya ▁dunia ▁wata ona ▁kuwa ▁una itwa ▁kwa ▁jina ▁la ▁Bwana , ▁nao ▁wat aku ogopa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁at aku pa ▁kus ta wi ▁kwa ▁wingi , ▁katika ▁tunda ▁la ▁uza o ▁wa ▁tum bo ▁lako , ▁katika ▁wanyama ▁wach anga ▁wa ▁mif ugo ▁yako ▁na ▁katika ▁ma zao ▁ya ▁ardhi ▁yako , ▁katika ▁nchi ▁ali yowa apia ▁baba ▁zako ▁kuwa pa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁ata fung ua ▁mbingu , ▁g hala ▁zake ▁za ▁baraka , ▁kuku pa ▁mvua ▁kwa ▁maj ira ▁yake ▁na ▁ku bar iki ▁kazi ▁zako ▁zote ▁za ▁mikono ▁yako . ▁U tak op esha ▁mataifa ▁mengi ▁lakini ▁hut ak opa ▁kwa ▁yeyote . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁at aku fanya ▁kichwa , ▁wala ▁si ▁mk ia . ▁Kama ▁uta zing atia ▁maag izo ▁ya ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wako ▁nin ay oku pa ▁siku ▁hii ▁ya ▁leo ▁na ▁kuya fuata ▁kwa ▁bidii , ▁daima ▁utakuwa ▁juu , ▁kamwe ▁hut akuwa ▁chini . </s> swh_Latn
▁Usi halifu ▁amri ▁zangu ▁zo zote ▁nina z oku pa ▁leo , ▁kwa ▁kwenda ▁ku ume ▁au ▁kush oto , ▁kwa ▁kufuata ▁mi ungu ▁ming ine ▁na ▁ku itum ikia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hata ▁hivyo , ▁kama ▁hut am tii ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wako ▁na ▁kuz ishika ▁kwa ▁bidii ▁amri ▁zake ▁zote ▁na ▁maag izo ▁nin ay oku pa ▁leo , ▁la ana ▁hizi ▁zote ▁zit akuja ▁juu ▁yako ▁na ▁kuku pata : </s> swh_Latn
▁U tala aniwa ▁mjini ▁na ▁uta la aniwa ▁mash ambani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kap u ▁lako ▁na ▁ch ombo ▁chako ▁cha ▁kuk andia ▁kita la aniwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁U zao ▁wa ▁tum bo ▁lako ▁uta la aniwa , ▁ma zao ▁ya ▁ardhi ▁yako , ▁nd ama ▁wa ▁mak undi ▁yako ▁ya ▁ng ʼ ombe ▁na ▁wana - k ondo o ▁wa ▁mak undi ▁yako . </s> swh_Latn
▁U tala aniwa ▁u ing iapo ▁na ▁ut ok apo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁ata leta ▁la ana ▁juu ▁yako , ▁fad haa ▁na ▁kuk ari piwa ▁katika ▁kila ▁kitu ▁unach ok ig usa ▁kwa ▁mkono ▁wako , ▁mpaka ▁uwe ▁um eh ari biwa ▁na ▁ku ang amizwa ▁gha fula ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁ma ovu ▁uli yoya fanya ▁kwa ▁kumwa cha ▁yeye . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁atak upi ga ▁kwa ▁mag onjwa ▁mpaka ▁aku ang ami ze ▁kutoka ▁nchi ▁unayo ingia ▁ku im iliki . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁atak upi ga ▁kwa ▁mag onjwa ▁ya ▁kud hoof isha , ▁kwa ▁homa ▁na ▁kuw ash wa , ▁hari ▁na ▁kwa ▁uk ame , ▁kutu ▁na ▁kuwa ▁na ▁uch ungu ▁ambavyo ▁vit ak upi ga ▁mpaka ▁uang amie . </s> swh_Latn
▁Anga ▁juu ▁yako ▁itakuwa ▁sha ba , ▁na ▁ardhi ▁chini ▁yako ▁itakuwa ▁chuma . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁ata fanya ▁mvua ▁ya ▁nchi ▁yako ▁kuwa ▁mav umbi ▁na ▁mch anga ; ▁vit aku jia ▁kutoka ▁ang ani ▁mpaka ▁uang amie . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁at aku fanya ▁us hind we ▁mbele ▁ya ▁ad ui ▁zako . ▁U tawa jia ▁kwa ▁njia ▁moja ▁lakini ▁uta wak imbia ▁mbele ▁yao ▁kwa ▁njia ▁saba , ▁nawe ▁utakuwa ▁kitu ▁cha ▁kuch ukiza ▁kwa ▁fal me ▁zote ▁za ▁dunia . </s> swh_Latn

▁Wakati ▁wa ▁ad hu huri ▁uta papas ap ap asa ▁huku ▁na ▁huko ▁kama ▁mtu ▁ki pofu ▁katika ▁giza . ▁H uta fanikiwa ▁katika ▁lolote ▁uf anyalo ; ▁siku ▁baada ▁ya ▁siku ▁uta one wa ▁na ▁kun yang ʼ anywa , ▁wala ▁hakuna ▁yeyote ▁at akay eku okoa . </s> swh_Latn
▁U tap osa ▁mke , ▁lakini ▁mtu ▁mwingine ▁atak utana ▁naye ▁kimwili . ▁Uta jenga ▁nyumba , ▁lakini ▁huta ishi ▁ndani ▁yake . ▁Uta panda ▁sh amba ▁la ▁mi za bibu , ▁lakini ▁hut akula ▁matunda ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ng ʼ ombe ▁wako ▁ata chin jwa ▁mbele ▁ya ▁macho ▁yako ▁lakini ▁hut akula ▁nyama ▁yake . ▁P unda ▁wako ▁ata ch ukuliwa ▁kwa ▁nguvu ▁kutoka ▁kwako ▁wala ▁hatar ud ishwa . ▁K ondo o ▁wako ▁wat ape wa ▁ad ui ▁zako , ▁wala ▁hakuna ▁mtu ▁yeyote ▁wa ▁kuwa okoa . </s> swh_Latn
▁W anao ▁na ▁binti ▁zako ▁wat ato lewa ▁kwa ▁mataifa ▁mengine , ▁nawe ▁uta yach osha ▁macho ▁yako ▁uki wata zam ia ▁siku ▁baada ▁ya ▁siku , ▁hut akuwa ▁na ▁nguvu ▁kuin ua ▁mkono . </s> swh_Latn
▁Tai fa ▁us ilo lij ua ▁wat akula ▁ma zao ▁ya ▁nchi ▁yako ▁na ▁taa bu ▁ya ▁kazi ▁yako , ▁hut akuwa ▁na ▁chochote , ▁bali ▁ku one wa ▁kik atili ▁siku ▁zako ▁zote . </s> swh_Latn
▁V itu ▁ut aka vy ovi ona ▁kwa ▁macho ▁yako ▁vit aku fanya ▁wa zimu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁ata ya piga ▁mago ti ▁yako ▁na ▁miguu ▁yako ▁kwa ▁maji pu ▁yenye ▁maumivu ▁makali ▁yasi y op onyeka , ▁yaki enea ▁kutoka ▁ny ayo ▁za ▁miguu ▁yako ▁hadi ▁ut osini . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁at aku peleka ▁wewe ▁na ▁mfalme ▁u liy em weka ▁juu ▁yako ▁uende ▁kwenye ▁taifa ▁ambalo ▁huku lij ua ▁wewe ▁wala ▁baba ▁zako . ▁H uko ▁uta ab udu ▁mi ungu ▁ming ine , ▁mi ungu ▁ya ▁miti ▁na ▁mawe . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ut akuwa ▁kitu ▁cha ▁kuch ukiza , ▁tena ▁kitu ▁cha ▁kud hara uliwa ▁na ▁kud hih akiwa ▁kwa ▁mataifa ▁yote ▁huko ▁Bwana ▁at akak oku peleka . </s> swh_Latn
▁Uta panda ▁mb egu ▁nyingi ▁katika ▁sh amba ▁lakini ▁u tav una ▁haba , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁nz ige ▁wata zila . </s> swh_Latn
▁Uta panda ▁mash amba ▁ya ▁mi za bibu ▁na ▁kuya pali lia , ▁lakini ▁hut ak unywa ▁di vai ▁yake ▁wala ▁hut akus anya ▁zabi bu , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁wad udu ▁wata zila . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ut akuwa ▁na ▁mi zeit uni ▁katika ▁nchi ▁yako ▁yote , ▁lakini ▁h utat umia ▁hayo ▁mafuta ▁yake , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ze it uni ▁zit ap uku tika . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ut akuwa ▁na ▁wana ▁na ▁binti ▁lakini ▁ha wat akuwa ▁nawe , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁wata ch ukuliwa ▁mateka . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mak undi ▁ya ▁nz ige ▁yata vam ia ▁miti ▁yako ▁yote ▁na ▁ma zao ▁ya ▁nchi ▁yako . </s> swh_Latn
▁M geni ▁anaye ishi ▁miongoni ▁mw ako ▁ata in uka ▁juu ▁zaidi ▁na ▁zaidi ▁kuliko ▁wewe , ▁lakini ▁wewe ▁ut ash uka ▁chini ▁zaidi ▁na ▁zaidi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yeye ▁at akuk op esha , ▁lakini ▁wewe ▁hut am kop esha . ▁Yeye ▁atakuwa ▁kichwa , ▁lakini ▁wewe ▁utakuwa ▁mk ia . </s> swh_Latn
▁La ana ▁hizi ▁zote ▁zit akuja ▁juu ▁yako . ▁Z it aku fu atia ▁na ▁kuku pata ▁mpaka ▁uang amiz we , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁hukum tii ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wako , ▁na ▁kuz ishika ▁amri ▁zake ▁na ▁maag izo ▁yake ▁aliy oku pa . </s> swh_Latn

▁N ita ile vya ▁mis hale ▁yangu ▁kwa ▁damu , ▁wakati ▁up anga ▁wangu ▁uk ita funa ▁nyama : ▁damu ▁ya ▁walio chin jwa ▁pamoja ▁na ▁mateka , ▁vich wa ▁vya ▁viongozi ▁wa ▁ad ui . " </s> swh_Latn
▁F ura hini , ▁enyi ▁mataifa , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁watu ▁wake , ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁ata ili pi za ▁damu ▁ya ▁watumishi ▁wake , ▁ata li pi za ▁kis asi ▁juu ▁ya ▁ad ui ▁zake ▁na ▁kufanya ▁up atan isho ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁nchi ▁na ▁watu ▁wake . </s> swh_Latn

" </s> swh_Latn

▁Yese ▁akam zaa ▁Daudi ▁ambaye ▁alikuwa ▁mfalme . ▁Daudi ▁akam zaa ▁Solomoni , ▁ambaye ▁mama ▁yake ▁ni ▁yule ▁aliyekuwa ▁mke ▁wa ▁Uria . </s> swh_Latn

▁Baada ▁ya ▁u ham isho ▁wa ▁Ba beli : ▁Yek onia ▁alim zaa ▁She al tie li , ▁She al tie li ▁akam zaa ▁Z eru ba beli , </s> swh_Latn

▁Az ori ▁akam zaa ▁Sad oki , ▁Sad oki ▁akam zaa ▁Ak imu , ▁Ak imu ▁akam zaa ▁Eli udi , </s> swh_Latn
▁Eli udi ▁akam zaa ▁Ele az ari , ▁Ele az ari ▁akam zaa ▁Mat ani , ▁Mat ani ▁akam zaa ▁Yakobo , </s> swh_Latn
▁naye ▁Yakobo ▁akam zaa ▁Yosefu ▁ambaye ▁alikuwa ▁mume we ▁Maria , ▁mama ▁yake ▁Yesu , ▁a itwa ye ▁Kristo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hivyo , ▁kuli ku wepo ▁na ▁jumla ▁ya ▁vi zazi ▁kumi ▁na ▁vinne ▁tangu ▁Abrahamu ▁mpaka ▁Daudi , ▁vi zazi ▁kumi ▁na ▁vinne ▁tangu ▁Daudi ▁hadi ▁wakati ▁wa ▁u ham isho ▁kwenda ▁utum wani ▁Ba beli , ▁na ▁vi zazi ▁kumi ▁na ▁vinne ▁tangu ▁wakati ▁wa ▁u ham isho ▁kwenda ▁utum wani ▁Ba beli ▁hadi ▁Kristo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Basi ▁Ku zaliwa ▁kwake ▁Yesu ▁Kristo ▁kulikuwa ▁hivi : ▁Maria ▁mama ▁yake ▁alikuwa ▁ame pos wa ▁na ▁Yosefu , ▁lakini ▁kabla ▁hawa jak utana ▁kimwili , ▁Maria ▁ali onekana ▁kuwa ▁na ▁mimba ▁kwa ▁u weza ▁wa ▁Roho ▁Mtakatifu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁kuwa ▁Yosefu , ▁mwana ume ▁aliyekuwa ▁am emp osa ▁alikuwa ▁mtu ▁mw adilifu , ▁hak utaka ▁kumwa ib isha ▁Maria ▁hadh arani , ▁alia zimu ▁kumwa cha ▁kwa ▁siri . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁mara ▁alipo az imu ▁kufanya ▁jambo ▁hili , ▁malaika ▁wa ▁Bwana ▁akam tok ea ▁katika ▁ndoto ▁na ▁kusema , ▁" Y osefu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Daudi , ▁usi og ope ▁kum chukua ▁Maria ▁awe ▁mke ▁wako , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁mimba ▁ali yo ▁nayo ▁ni ▁kwa ▁u weza ▁wa ▁Roho ▁Mtakatifu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Naye ▁atam zaa ▁mwana , ▁nawe ▁ut am wita ▁Jina ▁lake ▁Yesu , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁yeye ▁ndiye ▁atak aye wa okoa ▁watu ▁wake ▁kutoka ▁dhambi ▁zao . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Haya ▁yote ▁ya lit ukia ▁ili ▁litim ie ▁lile ▁Bwana ▁ali l okuwa ▁am enena ▁kupitia ▁na bii , ▁ak isema : </s> swh_Latn
▁" T az ama , ▁bik ira ▁ata chukua ▁mimba , ▁naye ▁atam zaa ▁mwana , ▁nao ▁wat am wita ▁Jina ▁lake ▁Iman ueli ": ▁maana ▁yake , ▁" Mungu ▁pamoja ▁nasi . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Yosefu ▁alipo amka ▁kutoka ▁us ingiz ini , ▁aka fanya ▁kama ▁vile ▁alivyo ag izwa ▁na ▁malaika ▁wa ▁Bwana , ▁akam chukua ▁Maria ▁kuwa ▁mke ▁wake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁hawak ukut ana ▁kimwili ▁mpaka ▁Maria ▁alipo ji fung ua ▁mwana we ▁kif ungua ▁mimba ▁akam wita ▁Jina ▁lake ▁Yesu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Baada ▁ya ▁Yesu ▁ku zaliwa ▁katika ▁mji ▁wa ▁Beth leh emu ▁huko ▁Uya hudi , ▁wakati ▁wa ▁utawala ▁wa ▁Mfalme ▁Herode , ▁w ataa lamu ▁wa ▁mambo ▁ya ▁nyota ▁kutoka ▁mashar iki ▁wali fika ▁Yerusalemu </s> swh_Latn
▁waki uliza , ▁" Y uko ▁wapi ▁huyo ▁aliye zaliwa ▁mfalme ▁wa ▁Wayahudi ? ▁Kwa ▁maana ▁tume ona ▁nyota ▁yake ▁ik it okea ▁mashar iki , ▁nasi ▁tum eku ja ▁kum wab udu . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Mfalme ▁Herode ▁ali pos ikia ▁jambo ▁hili ▁ali ingiwa ▁na ▁hofu ▁sana ▁pamoja ▁na ▁watu ▁wote ▁wa ▁Yerusalemu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Herode ▁akawa ita ▁pamoja ▁viongozi ▁wa ▁maku hani ▁na ▁wa limu ▁wa ▁sheria , ▁akawa uliza ▁ni ▁mahali ▁gani ▁ambapo ▁Kristo ▁ange zaliwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nao ▁wakam wambia , ▁" Kat ika ▁Beth leh emu ▁ya ▁Uya hudi , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁hivyo ▁ndivyo ▁ilivyo andikwa ▁na ▁na bii : </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' Na we , ▁Beth leh emu , ▁katika ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Yuda , ▁wewe ▁si ▁mdogo ▁miongoni ▁mwa ▁wata wala ▁wa ▁Yuda ; ▁kwa ▁maana ▁kutoka ▁kwako ▁at akuja ▁mta wala ▁at akay ekuwa ▁mch ungaji ▁wa ▁watu ▁wangu ▁Israeli .' ▁" </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁Herode ▁akawa ita ▁wale ▁w ataa lamu ▁wa ▁nyota ▁kwa ▁siri ▁na ▁kut aka ▁kujua ▁kutoka ▁kwao ▁uhakika ▁kamili ▁wa ▁wakati ▁ile ▁nyota ▁ili onekana . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁aka wat uma ▁wa ende ▁Beth leh emu ▁akiwa ambia , ▁" N end eni ▁m kam ta fu te ▁kwa ▁bidii ▁huyo ▁mtoto . ▁N anyi ▁mara ▁m tak ap om wona , ▁m nile tee ▁habari ▁ili ▁na ▁mimi ▁niwe ze ▁kwenda ▁kum wab udu . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Baada ▁ya ▁kum sik ia ▁mfalme , ▁wale ▁w ataa lamu ▁wa ▁nyota ▁waka enda ▁zao , ▁nayo ▁ile ▁nyota ▁wali yoi ona ▁mashar iki ▁ika wat angu lia , ▁nao ▁waka i fuata ▁mpaka ▁ili pos imama ▁mahali ▁pale ▁alipokuwa ▁mtoto . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wali poi ona ▁ile ▁nyota ▁waka jawa ▁na ▁furaha ▁kubwa ▁mno . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wali po ingia ▁ndani ▁ya ▁ile ▁nyumba , ▁wakam wona ▁mtoto ▁pamoja ▁na ▁Maria ▁mama ▁yake , ▁wakam su j udu ▁na ▁kum wab udu ▁yule ▁mtoto ▁Yesu . ▁Ndipo ▁waka fung ua ▁haz ina ▁zao , ▁wakam to lea ▁zawadi ▁za ▁dhahabu , ▁uv umba ▁na ▁man emane . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nao ▁waki isha ▁ku onywa ▁katika ▁ndoto ▁was ir udi ▁kwa ▁Herode , ▁wak aru di ▁kwenda ▁katika ▁nchi ▁yao ▁kwa ▁njia ▁nyingine . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wali pok wisha ▁kwenda ▁zao , ▁malaika ▁wa ▁Bwana ▁akam tok ea ▁Yosefu ▁katika ▁ndoto ▁akam wambia , ▁" Ond oka , ▁mch ukue ▁mtoto ▁na ▁mama ▁yake ▁mk im bili e ▁Misri . ▁Ka eni ▁huko ▁mpaka ▁nit ak apo wa ambia , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁Herode ▁an ataka ▁kum ta futa ▁huyu ▁mtoto ▁ili ▁amu ue . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Yosefu ▁aka ondoka , ▁akam chukua ▁mtoto ▁pamoja ▁na ▁mama ▁yake ▁wakati ▁wa ▁usiku , ▁nao ▁waka enda ▁Misri </s> swh_Latn
▁amb ako ▁wa lika a ▁mpaka ▁Herode ▁alipo far iki . ▁Hili ▁li lif anyika ▁ili ▁litim ie ▁lile ▁lilil onen wa ▁na ▁Bwana ▁kwa ▁kiny wa ▁cha ▁na bii ▁kusema : ▁" Ni lim wita ▁mwan angu ▁kutoka ▁Misri . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Herode ▁alip ong ʼ amua ▁kwamba ▁wale ▁w ataa lamu ▁wa ▁nyota ▁wam em sh inda ▁kwa ▁akili , ▁alik as irika ▁sana , ▁naye ▁ak atoa ▁amri ▁ya ▁kuwa ua ▁watoto ▁wote ▁wa ▁ki ume ▁wenye ▁umri ▁wa ▁miaka ▁miwili ▁kurudi ▁chini ▁katika ▁mji ▁wa ▁Beth leh emu ▁na ▁sehemu ▁zote ▁za ▁jir ani , ▁kufu atana ▁na ▁ule ▁muda ▁ali o ambiwa ▁na ▁wale ▁w ataa lamu ▁wa ▁nyota . </s> swh_Latn

▁Aka ondoka ▁Nazar eti ▁aka enda ▁kuishi ▁Kaperna umu , ▁mji ▁uli oko ▁karibu ▁na ▁bahari , ▁katika ▁mi paka ▁ya ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Zab uloni ▁na ▁Naf tali , </s> swh_Latn

▁Yesu ▁alipokuwa ▁anat embea ▁k ando ▁ya ▁Bah ari ▁ya ▁Gali laya , ▁aliwa ona ▁ndugu ▁wawili , ▁Simoni ▁a itwa ye ▁Petro , ▁na ▁Andrea ▁ndugu ▁yake . ▁Wali kuwa ▁wak iz itu pa ▁nya vu ▁zao ▁bahar ini ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁wao ▁walikuwa ▁wa vu vi . </s> swh_Latn

▁Mara ▁waka zia cha ▁nya vu ▁zao , ▁wakam fuata . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ali po endelea ▁mbele ▁kutoka ▁pale , ▁akawa ona ▁ndugu ▁wengine ▁wawili , ▁Yakobo ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Zeb ed ayo ▁na ▁Yohana ▁ndugu ye , ▁wakiwa ▁wam ekaa ▁kwenye ▁mash ua ▁pamoja ▁na ▁baba ▁yao ▁Zeb ed ayo , ▁wak iz it engeneza ▁nya vu ▁zao . ▁Yesu ▁akawa ita . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nao ▁mara ▁waka ia cha ▁mash ua ▁yao , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁baba ▁yao , ▁wakam fuata . </s> swh_Latn

▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁sifa ▁zake ▁zika enea ▁sehemu ▁zote ▁za ▁Sh amu , ▁nao ▁watu ▁wakam le tea ▁wote ▁waliokuwa ▁na ▁mag onjwa ▁mbalimbali ▁na ▁maumivu , ▁wali op aga wa ▁na ▁pe po ▁wa cha fu , ▁wenye ▁ki fafa ▁na ▁wali opo o za , ▁naye ▁akawa pon ya . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mak utano ▁makubwa ▁ya ▁watu ▁yaka wa ▁yan am jia ▁kutoka ▁Gali laya , ▁Dek apo li , ▁Yerusalemu , ▁Uya hudi ▁na ▁kutoka ▁ng ʼ ambo ▁ya ▁M to ▁Yord ani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Basi ▁Yesu ▁alipo ona ▁mak utano , ▁ali panda ▁m lim ani ▁akak eti ▁chini , ▁nao ▁wanafunzi ▁wake ▁wakam jia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁aka anza ▁kuwa fundisha , ▁ak isema : </s> swh_Latn
▁" H eri ▁walio ▁mask ini ▁wa ▁roho , ▁maana ▁Ufalme ▁wa ▁Mb inguni ▁ni ▁wao . </s> swh_Latn
▁H eri ▁wale ▁wanao hu zun ika , ▁maana ▁hao ▁wata fari jiwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁H eri ▁walio ▁wapo le , ▁maana ▁hao ▁wata ir ithi ▁nchi . </s> swh_Latn
▁H eri ▁wenye ▁njaa ▁na ▁kiu ▁ya ▁haki , ▁maana ▁hao ▁wat atos hele zwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁H eri ▁wenye ▁huruma , ▁maana ▁hao ▁wat apata ▁reh ema . </s> swh_Latn
▁H eri ▁walio ▁na ▁moyo ▁safi , ▁maana ▁hao ▁wat am wona ▁Mungu . </s> swh_Latn
▁H eri ▁walio ▁wap atan ishi , ▁maana ▁hao ▁wata itwa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Mungu . </s> swh_Latn
▁H eri ▁wana otes wa ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ya ▁haki , ▁maana ▁Ufalme ▁wa ▁Mb inguni ▁ni ▁wao . </s> swh_Latn
▁" H eri ▁ninyi ▁watu ▁watak apo wash ut umu , ▁na ▁kuwat esa ▁na ▁kunena ▁dhidi ▁yenu ▁mabaya ▁ya ▁aina ▁zote ▁kwa ▁uongo ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yangu . </s> swh_Latn
▁F ura hini ▁na ▁kush angi lia ▁kwa ▁maana ▁tha wabu ▁yenu ▁ni ▁kubwa ▁mbinguni , ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁hivyo ▁ndivyo ▁wali vyo wat esa ▁mana bii ▁waliokuwa ▁kabla ▁yenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁" N inyi ▁ni ▁chum vi ▁ya ▁ulimwengu . ▁Lakini ▁chum vi ▁iki poteza ▁lad ha ▁yake , ▁ya weza je ▁kur ud ishiwa ▁lad ha ▁yake ▁tena ? ▁Hai fai ▁tena ▁kwa ▁kitu ▁chochote , ▁ila ▁kutu pwa ▁nje ▁ikanya gwe ▁na ▁watu . </s> swh_Latn
▁" N inyi ▁ni ▁nuru ▁ya ▁ulimwengu . ▁M ji ▁uli oj engwa ▁kilim ani ▁hau wezi ▁kufi chika . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wala ▁watu ▁hawa washi ▁taa ▁na ▁kui funika ▁kwa ▁baku li . ▁Badala ▁yake , ▁hui weka ▁kwenye ▁kin ara ▁chake , ▁nayo ▁h utoa ▁mwanga ▁kwa ▁kila ▁mtu ▁aliy emo ▁ndani ▁ya ▁ile ▁nyumba . </s> swh_Latn
▁V ivyo ▁hivyo , ▁nuru ▁yenu ▁i anga ze ▁mbele ▁ya ▁watu , ▁ili ▁wap ate ▁kuona ▁matendo ▁yenu ▁mema ▁wam tuk uze ▁Baba ▁yenu ▁aliye ▁mbinguni . </s> swh_Latn
▁" Ms idh ani ▁kwamba ▁nim eku ja ▁ku futa ▁Sheria ▁au ▁Mana bii ; ▁siku ja ▁ku ondoa ▁bali ▁kutimiza . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁maana , ▁amin ▁nawa ambia , ▁mpaka ▁mbingu ▁na ▁dunia ▁zit akap opita , ▁hakuna ▁hata ▁her ufi ▁moja ▁ndogo ▁wala ▁nuk ta ▁it akay opo tea ▁kwa ▁namna ▁yoyote ▁kutoka ▁kwenye ▁Sheria , ▁mpaka ▁kila ▁kitu ▁ki we ▁kim et imia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁hiyo , ▁yeyote ▁atak aye vun ja ▁moja wapo ▁ya ▁amri ▁ndogo ▁kuliko ▁zote ▁ya ▁amri ▁hizi , ▁naye ▁akawa fundisha ▁wengine ▁kufanya ▁hivyo , ▁ata itwa ▁mdogo ▁kabisa ▁katika ▁Ufalme ▁wa ▁Mb inguni , ▁lakini ▁yeyote ▁az it end aye ▁na ▁kuzi fundisha ▁hizi ▁amri ▁ata itwa ▁mkuu ▁katika ▁Ufalme ▁wa ▁Mb inguni . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁maana ▁nawa ambia , ▁haki ▁yenu ▁isi poz idi ▁haki ▁ya ▁Ma far isayo ▁na ▁wa limu ▁wa ▁sheria , ▁kamwe ▁ham ta ingia ▁katika ▁Ufalme ▁wa ▁Mb inguni . </s> swh_Latn
▁" M mes ikia ▁wali vyo ambiwa ▁watu ▁wa ▁zamani ▁kwamba , ▁' U si ue . ▁Ye yote ▁atak aye ua ▁ata paswa ▁hukumu .' </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁mimi ▁nawa ambia ▁kwamba , ▁yeyote ▁at akay em kas ir ikia ▁ndugu ▁yake , ▁ata paswa ▁hukumu . ▁Tena , ▁yeyote ▁at akay em wambia ▁ndugu ▁yake , ▁' R aka ,' at apaswa ▁kuji bu ▁kwa ▁Bara za ▁la ▁Wayahudi . L akini ▁yeyote ▁at akay esema ▁' We we ▁mp umba vu !' ▁ata paswa ▁hukumu ▁ya ▁moto ▁wa ▁je han amu . </s> swh_Latn
▁" Kwa ▁hiyo , ▁kama ▁un atoa ▁sadaka ▁yako ▁mad ha bah uni , ▁uk ak umbuka ▁kuwa ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁ana ▁kitu ▁dhidi ▁yako , </s> swh_Latn
▁i ache ▁sadaka ▁yako ▁hapo ▁mbele ▁ya ▁mad haba hu . ▁Enda ▁kwanza ▁uk apat ane ▁na ▁ndugu ▁yako ; ▁kisha ▁uru di ▁na ▁uk ato e ▁sadaka ▁yako . </s> swh_Latn

▁Ji cho ▁lako ▁la ▁ku ume ▁lik ik usa babisha ▁kutenda ▁dhambi , ▁ling ʼ oe ▁uli tu pe ▁mbali . ▁Ni ▁af ad hali ▁kwako ▁ku poteza ▁ki ungo ▁kimoja ▁cha ▁mwili ▁wako ▁kuliko ▁mwili ▁wako ▁mzima ▁ukat upwa ▁je han amu . </s> swh_Latn

▁M ta wat ambua ▁kwa ▁matunda ▁yao . ▁Je , ▁watu ▁hu chuma ▁zabi bu ▁kwenye ▁mi iba , ▁au ▁tini ▁kwenye ▁mich ong oma ? </s> swh_Latn
▁V ivyo ▁hivyo , ▁mti ▁mw ema ▁hu zaa ▁matunda ▁mazuri , ▁na ▁mti ▁mbaya ▁hu zaa ▁matunda ▁mabaya . </s> swh_Latn
▁M ti ▁mw ema ▁hau wezi ▁kuza a ▁matunda ▁mabaya , ▁wala ▁mti ▁mbaya ▁hau wezi ▁kuza a ▁matunda ▁mazuri . </s> swh_Latn

▁Filipo , ▁na ▁Bar th olom ayo ; ▁Tom aso , ▁na ▁Mathayo ▁m to za ▁ush uru ; ▁Yakobo ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Alf ayo , ▁na ▁Th ad ayo ; </s> swh_Latn
▁Simoni ▁M kan anayo , ▁na ▁Yuda ▁Isk ario te ▁ali yem sa liti ▁Yesu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hawa ▁kumi ▁na ▁wawili , ▁Yesu ▁ali wat uma ▁akawa agiza : ▁" M si ende ▁miongoni ▁mwa ▁watu ▁wa ▁Mataifa , ▁wala ▁msi ing ie ▁mji ▁wowote ▁wa ▁Was amaria . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁af ad hali ▁msh ike ▁njia ▁kuwa ende a ▁kondo o ▁wa ▁nyumba ▁ya ▁Israeli ▁wali opo tea . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wakati ▁mn ap ok wenda , ▁hub ir ini ▁mk isema , ▁' U falme ▁wa ▁Mb inguni ▁um ek ari bia .' </s> swh_Latn
▁P onyeni ▁wag onjwa , ▁fufu eni ▁wafu , ▁tak as eni ▁wenye ▁uk oma , ▁to eni ▁pe po ▁wa cha fu . ▁Mme pata ▁bure , ▁to eni ▁bure . </s> swh_Latn
▁M sich ukue ▁dhahabu , ▁wala ▁fedha , ▁wala ▁sha ba ▁kwenye ▁vi f uko ▁vy enu . </s> swh_Latn
▁M sich ukue ▁m koba ▁wa ▁safari , ▁wala ▁kan zu ▁mbili , ▁wala ▁jo zi ▁ya ▁pili ▁ya ▁vi atu , ▁wala ▁f imbo , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁mt end akazi ▁an asta hili ▁pos ho ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁" M ji ▁wowote ▁au ▁ki jiji ▁chochote ▁m tak apo ingia , ▁taf ut eni ▁humo ▁mtu ▁anay esta hili , ▁nanyi ▁ka eni ▁kwake ▁mpaka ▁m tak apo ondoka . </s> swh_Latn
▁M ki ingia ▁kwenye ▁nyumba , ▁it aki eni ▁amani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kama ▁nyumba ▁hiyo ▁in asta hili , ▁amani ▁yenu ▁na ▁iwe ▁juu ▁yake . ▁La ▁si vyo , ▁amani ▁yenu ▁na ▁i war ud ie ▁ninyi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kama ▁mtu ▁yeyote ▁hata wak arib isha ▁ninyi , ▁wala ▁kus ikiliza ▁maneno ▁yenu , ▁kung ʼ ut eni ▁mav umbi ▁kutoka ▁kwenye ▁miguu ▁yenu ▁m tak ap okuwa ▁m nat oka ▁kwenye ▁nyumba ▁hiyo ▁au ▁mji ▁huo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Amin , ▁nawa ambia , ▁itakuwa ▁rahisi ▁zaidi ▁kwa ▁miji ▁ya ▁Sodoma ▁na ▁Gomora ▁kus ta him ili ▁katika ▁hukumu ▁kuliko ▁mji ▁huo . </s> swh_Latn
▁" T az ama , ▁nina wat uma ▁kama ▁kondo o ▁katikati ▁ya ▁mbwa ▁mw itu . ▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁mwe ▁were vu ▁kama ▁nyoka ▁na ▁wapo le ▁kama ▁hua . </s> swh_Latn
▁" Jih adh ar ini ▁na ▁wanadamu ; ▁kwa ▁maana ▁wata wa peleka ▁katika ▁mab ara za ▁yao ▁na ▁kuwa piga ▁kwenye ▁masin ag ogi ▁yao . </s> swh_Latn
▁N anyi ▁mta bur utwa ▁mbele ▁ya ▁wata wala ▁na ▁wa falme ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yangu , ▁ili ▁kuwa ▁us hu huda ▁kwao ▁na ▁kwa ▁watu ▁wa ▁Mataifa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁watak apo wa peleka ▁humo , ▁ms is umb uke ▁kufik iria ▁m tak alos ema , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁mta pewa ▁la ▁kusema ▁wakati ▁huo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁sababu ▁si ▁ninyi ▁mt aka okuwa ▁m kin ena , ▁bali ▁ni ▁Roho ▁wa ▁Baba ▁yenu ▁at akay ekuwa ▁akin ena ▁kupitia ▁kwenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁" Nd ugu ▁atam sa liti ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁ili ▁aua we , ▁naye ▁baba ▁atam sa liti ▁mtoto ▁wake . ▁Watoto ▁nao ▁wata asi ▁dhidi ▁ya ▁wazazi ▁wao ▁na ▁kusa babisha ▁wa ua we . </s> swh_Latn

▁" Mwana funzi ▁ha wezi ▁kum zidi ▁mwa limu ▁wake , ▁wala ▁mtum ishi ▁ham zidi ▁bwana ▁wake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yat osha ▁mwana funzi ▁kuwa ▁kama ▁mwa limu ▁wake , ▁na ▁mtum ishi ▁kuwa ▁kama ▁bwana ▁wake . ▁Ikiwa ▁mkuu ▁wa ▁nyumba ▁ame itwa ▁Be el ze buli , ▁je , ▁si ▁wata wa ita ▁zaidi ▁wale ▁wa ▁nyumbani ▁mwake ! </s> swh_Latn
▁" Kwa ▁hiyo ▁msi wa og ope ▁hao , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁hakuna ▁kilicho fi chika ▁ambacho ▁hak ita f unu liwa , ▁wala ▁hakuna ▁siri ▁ambayo ▁ha ita julikana . </s> swh_Latn

▁" O le ▁wenu ▁wa limu ▁wa ▁sheria ▁na ▁Ma far isayo , ▁enyi ▁wana fiki ! ▁Nin yi ▁mn asa firi ▁bahar ini ▁na ▁nchi ▁kavu ▁ili ▁kum fanya ▁mtu ▁mmoja ▁mw ongo fu , ▁lakini ▁baada ▁ya ▁kum pata , ▁m nam fanya ▁mwana ▁wa ▁je han amu ▁mara ▁mbili ▁kuliko ▁ninyi ! </s> swh_Latn
▁" O le ▁wenu , ▁viongozi ▁vi pofu ! ▁Nin yi ▁mw asema , ▁' M tu ▁ak iapa ▁kwa ▁Hek alu , ▁kia po ▁hicho ▁si ▁kitu ; ▁lakini ▁mtu ▁ak iapa ▁kwa ▁dhahabu ▁ya ▁Hek alu , ▁am ef ungwa ▁kwa ▁kia po ▁chake .' </s> swh_Latn
▁Nin yi ▁vi pofu ▁wap umba vu ! ▁Ni ▁ki pi ▁kilicho ▁kik uu ▁zaidi : ▁ni ▁ile ▁dhahabu , ▁au ▁ni ▁lile ▁Hek alu ▁linalo ifanya ▁hiyo ▁dhahabu ▁kuwa ▁takatifu ? </s> swh_Latn

▁" L akini ▁wale ▁wenye ▁bus ara ▁waka wa jibu , ▁' S ivyo , ▁hayat utos hi ▁sisi ▁na ▁ninyi ▁pia . ▁Af ad hali ▁mw ende ▁kwa ▁wa uza o ▁mka jin unu lie ▁mafuta ▁yenu .' </s> swh_Latn
▁" Na o ▁walip okuwa ▁waki enda ▁kununua ▁mafuta , ▁bwana ▁ar usi ▁aka fika . ▁Wale ▁wana wali ▁waliokuwa ▁tayari ▁waka ingia ▁ndani ▁pamoja ▁naye ▁kwenye ▁kar amu ▁ya ▁ar usi ▁na ▁ml ango ▁uka fungwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁" Ba ad aye ▁wale ▁wana wali ▁wengine ▁nao ▁waka ja , ▁waka ita , ▁' B wana ! ▁Bwana ! ▁Tu fungu lie ▁ml ango !' </s> swh_Latn

▁" Kwa ▁hiyo ▁kes heni , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ham jui ▁siku ▁wala ▁saa . </s> swh_Latn
▁" T ena , ▁Ufalme ▁wa ▁Mb inguni ▁ni ▁kama ▁mtu ▁ali yet aka ▁kusa firi , ▁naye ▁akawa ita ▁watumishi ▁wake ▁na ▁kuweka ▁mali ▁yake ▁kwenye ▁u anga lizi ▁wao . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mmo ja ▁ak ampa ▁tal antat ano , ▁mwingine ▁tal anta ▁mbili , ▁na ▁mwingine ▁tal anta ▁moja . ▁Kila ▁mmoja ▁ali pewa ▁kwa ▁kadiri ▁ya ▁uwezo ▁wake . ▁Kisha ▁yeye ▁akasa firi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Y ule ▁aliye pewa ▁tal anta ▁tano ▁aka enda ▁mara ▁moja ▁aka fanya ▁nazo ▁biashara ▁akap ata ▁tal anta ▁nyingine ▁tano ▁zaidi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Y ule ▁aliye pewa ▁tal anta ▁mbili ▁aka fanya ▁vi vyo ▁hivyo , ▁akap ata ▁nyingine ▁mbili ▁zaidi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁yule ▁mtum ishi ▁aliyekuwa ▁am ep okea ▁tal anta ▁moja , ▁alik wenda ▁aka ch imba ▁shimo ▁ardh ini ▁na ▁kui fi cha ▁ile ▁fedha ▁ya ▁bwana ▁wake . </s> swh_Latn
▁" Ba ada ▁ya ▁muda ▁mrefu , ▁yule ▁bwana ▁wa ▁wale ▁watumishi ▁ak aru di ▁na ▁kufanya ▁hesa bu ▁nao . </s> swh_Latn
▁Y ule ▁mtum ishi ▁aliye pok ea ▁tal anta ▁tano ▁aka ja , ▁aka leta ▁nyingine ▁tano ▁zaidi . ▁Ak asema , ▁' B wana ▁uli weka ▁kwenye ▁u anga lizi ▁wangu ▁tal anta ▁tano . ▁Ta zama , ▁nime pata ▁faida ▁ya ▁tal anta ▁tano ▁zaidi .' </s> swh_Latn
▁" B wana ▁wake ▁akam wambia , ▁' U me fanya ▁vizuri ▁sana , ▁mtum ishi ▁mw ema ▁na ▁mw aminifu ! ▁Um ekuwa ▁mw aminifu ▁kwa ▁vitu ▁vich ache ; ▁nami ▁nit aku weka ▁kuwa ▁msim amizi ▁wa ▁vitu ▁vingi . ▁N joo ▁us hiriki ▁katika ▁furaha ▁ya ▁bwana ▁wako !' </s> swh_Latn
▁" Y ule ▁mwenye ▁tal anta ▁mbili ▁naye ▁aka ja . ▁Ak asema , ▁' B wana , ▁uli weka ▁kwenye ▁u anga lizi ▁wangu ▁tal anta ▁mbili . ▁Ta zama ▁nime pata ▁hapa ▁tal anta ▁mbili ▁zaidi .' </s> swh_Latn
▁" B wana ▁wake ▁aka jibu , ▁' U me fanya ▁vizuri ▁sana , ▁mtum ishi ▁mw ema ▁na ▁mw aminifu . ▁Um ekuwa ▁mw aminifu ▁kwa ▁vitu ▁vich ache ; ▁nami ▁nit aku weka ▁kuwa ▁msim amizi ▁wa ▁vitu ▁vingi . ▁N joo ▁us hiriki ▁katika ▁furaha ▁ya ▁bwana ▁wako !' </s> swh_Latn

▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁nili ogopa , ▁nika enda , ▁n ikai fi cha ▁tal anta ▁yako ▁ardh ini . ▁Ta zama , ▁hii ▁hapa ▁ile ▁iliyo ▁mali ▁yako .' </s> swh_Latn

▁In ukeni , ▁tw ende ▁zetu ! ▁Ta zam eni , ▁msa liti ▁wangu ▁y ua ja !" </s> swh_Latn

▁Kwa ▁maana ▁yeyote ▁anay etaka ▁kuya okoa ▁maisha ▁yake ▁ata ya poteza , ▁lakini ▁yeyote ▁atak aye ya poteza ▁maisha ▁yake ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yangu ▁na ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁Injili ▁ata ya okoa . </s> swh_Latn

▁Au ▁mtu ▁at atoa ▁nini ▁badala ▁ya ▁nafsi ▁yake ? </s> swh_Latn

▁Pilato ▁alikuwa ▁aki ji uliza ▁kama ▁Yesu ▁alikuwa ▁amek wisha ▁kufa . ▁Hivyo ▁akam wita ▁yule ▁jem adari , ▁akamu uliza ▁iwa po ▁Yesu ▁alikuwa ▁amek wisha ▁kufa . </s> swh_Latn

▁Hivyo ▁Yosefu ▁akan unua ▁kit amba a ▁cha ▁kit ani ▁safi , ▁aka ush usha ▁mwili ▁kutoka ▁msa lab ani , ▁aka uf unga ▁katika ▁kile ▁kit amba a ▁cha ▁kit ani , ▁na ▁ku uw eka ▁ndani ▁ya ▁kab uri ▁lililo ch ongwa ▁kwenye ▁mw amba . ▁Kisha ▁aka ving ir isha ▁ji we ▁kwenye ▁ing ilio ▁la ▁kab uri . </s> swh_Latn

▁Siku ▁moja ▁Yesu ▁alipokuwa ▁ak if und isha , ▁Ma far isayo ▁na ▁wa limu ▁wa ▁sheria , ▁waliokuwa ▁wam et oka ▁kila ▁ki jiji ▁cha ▁Gali laya ▁na ▁kutoka ▁Uya hudi ▁na ▁Yerusalemu , ▁walikuwa ▁wamek eti ▁huko . ▁Nao ▁u weza ▁wa ▁Bwana ▁ulikuwa ▁juu ▁yake ▁kupon ya ▁wag onjwa . </s> swh_Latn

▁Wali p okuwa ▁hawa wezi ▁kufanya ▁hivyo ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ya ▁um ati ▁wa ▁watu , ▁wakap anda ▁juu ▁ya ▁paa , ▁waka ondoa ▁baadhi ▁ya ▁mato fali , ▁wakam ter ems ha ▁yule ▁mg onjwa ▁kwa ▁mk eka ▁wake ▁hadi ▁katikati ▁ya ▁ule ▁um ati ▁pale ▁mbele ▁ya ▁Yesu . </s> swh_Latn

▁Ma far isayo ▁na ▁wale ▁wa limu ▁wa ▁sheria ▁waka anza ▁ku uliza , ▁" Ni ▁nani ▁mtu ▁huyu ▁anay esema ▁maneno ▁ya ▁kuku f uru ? ▁Ni ▁nani ▁awe z aye ▁kus amehe ▁dhambi ▁isipokuwa ▁Mungu ▁peke ▁yake ?" </s> swh_Latn

▁" M bona ▁un ata zama ▁ki banzi ▁kilicho ▁ndani ▁ya ▁ji cho ▁la ▁ndugu ▁yako , ▁wala ▁hu oni ▁bor iti ▁iliyo ▁ndani ▁ya ▁ji cho ▁lako ▁mwenyewe ? </s> swh_Latn
▁Uta weza je ▁kum wambia ▁ndugu ▁yako , ▁' Nd ugu ▁yangu , ▁acha ▁nito e ▁ki banzi ▁kilicho ▁ndani ▁ya ▁ji cho ▁lako ,' ▁wakati ▁wewe ▁mwenyewe ▁hu oni ▁bor iti ▁iliyo ▁ndani ▁ya ▁ji cho ▁lako ? ▁Ewe ▁mna fiki , ▁ondo a ▁bor iti ▁ndani ▁ya ▁ji cho ▁lako ▁kwanza , ▁ndipo ▁uta weza ▁kuona ▁dhah iri ▁jinsi ▁ya ▁ku ondoa ▁ki banzi ▁kilicho ▁ndani ▁ya ▁ji cho ▁la ▁ndugu ▁yako . </s> swh_Latn

▁Yeye ▁ni ▁kama ▁mtu ▁aliye jenga ▁nyumba , ▁aka ch imba ▁chini ▁sana , ▁na ▁kuweka ▁msingi ▁kwenye ▁mw amba . ▁Ma fur iko ▁ya lip oku ja , ▁maji ▁ya ▁gha fula ▁yali i piga ▁ile ▁nyumba , ▁lakini ▁haiku tik isika , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ilikuwa ▁ime jeng wa ▁vizuri . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁yeye ▁anay es ikia ▁maneno ▁yangu ▁wala ▁asi yat ende , ▁ni ▁kama ▁mtu ▁aliye jenga ▁nyumba ▁juu ▁ya ▁ardhi ▁bila ▁kuweka ▁msingi . ▁Ma fur iko ▁yali po ik umba ▁nyumba ▁ile , ▁ika anguka ▁mara ▁na ▁kub omoka ▁kabisa . " </s> swh_Latn

▁Siku ▁ya ▁hukumu , ▁watu ▁wa ▁Nina wi ▁wat asim ama ▁pamoja ▁na ▁ki zazi ▁hiki ▁na ▁ku kih ukumu ; ▁kwa ▁maana ▁wao ▁wali tu bu ▁wali pos ikia ▁ma hubiri ▁ya ▁Yona . ▁Na ▁ta zama , ▁hapa ▁y upo ▁yeye ▁aliye ▁mkuu ▁kuliko ▁Yona . </s> swh_Latn

▁Herode ▁akamu uliza ▁maswali ▁mengi , ▁lakini ▁Yesu ▁hak um jibu ▁lolote . </s> swh_Latn

▁Herode ▁na ▁ask ari ▁wake ▁wakam dhi haki ▁Yesu ▁na ▁kum fanyia ▁m zaha . ▁Wak am vika ▁vazi ▁zuri ▁sana , ▁wakam rud isha ▁kwa ▁Pilato . </s> swh_Latn
▁Siku ▁hiyo , ▁Herode ▁na ▁Pilato ▁waka wa ▁marafiki ; ▁kabla ▁ya ▁jambo ▁hili ▁walikuwa ▁na ▁u ad ui ▁kati ▁yao . </s> swh_Latn
▁Basi ▁Pilato ▁akawa ita ▁pamoja ▁viongozi ▁wa ▁maku hani , ▁viongozi ▁wengine ▁na ▁watu , </s> swh_Latn

▁Basi ▁yule ▁mtu ▁aliye p onywa ▁haku fahamu ▁ni ▁nani ▁aliy emp onya , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁Yesu ▁alikuwa ▁ame ji ondoa ▁katika ▁ule ▁um ati ▁wa ▁watu ▁uli okuwa ▁hapo . </s> swh_Latn

▁Hakika ▁kama ▁vile ▁Baba ▁awa fu fua vyo ▁wafu ▁na ▁kuwa pa ▁uzima , ▁vi vyo ▁hivyo ▁Mwana ▁huwa pa ▁uzima ▁wale ▁ana op enda . </s> swh_Latn

▁" Amin , ▁amin ▁nawa ambia , ▁yeyote ▁anay es ikia ▁maneno ▁yangu ▁na ▁kum wam ini ▁yeye ▁ali yen ituma , ▁anao ▁uzima ▁wa ▁milele , ▁naye ▁hata huk umiwa , ▁bali ▁am ep ita ▁kutoka ▁maut ini , ▁na ▁kuingia ▁uz imani . </s> swh_Latn

▁" Kwa ▁nini ▁man uk ato ▁haya ▁hay aku u zwa ▁kwa ▁din ari ▁300 ▁na ▁fedha ▁hizo ▁wak ape wa ▁mask ini ?" </s> swh_Latn

▁Wana funzi ▁wake ▁Yesu ▁mwan zoni ▁hawaku elewa ▁mambo ▁haya , ▁lakini ▁Yesu ▁ali pot uku zwa , ▁ndipo ▁walip ok umbuka ▁kuwa ▁mambo ▁haya ▁yalikuwa ▁yame andikwa ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yake ▁na ▁ali tende wa ▁yeye . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wale ▁wali oku wepo ▁wakati ▁Yesu ▁ali pom wita ▁Lazaro ▁kutoka ▁kabur ini ▁na ▁kum fu fua ▁kutoka ▁kwa ▁wafu , ▁wali endelea ▁kus huh udia . </s> swh_Latn

▁Yesu ▁akawa ambia , ▁" M sif adha ike ▁mi oy oni ▁mwen u , ▁m nam wam ini ▁Mungu , ▁ni amin ini ▁na ▁mimi ▁pia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ny umb ani ▁kwa ▁Baba ▁yangu ▁kuna ▁makao ▁mengi . ▁Kama ▁si vyo , ▁ning eliwa ambia . ▁Na enda ▁kuwa anda lia ▁makao . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nami ▁niki enda ▁na ▁kuwa anda lia ▁makao , ▁nit aru di ▁tena ▁na ▁kuwa chukua ▁m kae ▁pamoja ▁nami , ▁ili ▁mahali ▁nili po , ▁nanyi ▁mpate ▁kuwe po . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nin yi ▁mna jua ▁njia ▁ya ▁kufika ▁nin ak ok wenda . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Tom aso ▁akam wambia , ▁" B wana , ▁sisi ▁hatu jui ▁un ak ok wenda , ▁tu tai jua je ▁njia ?" </s> swh_Latn
▁Yesu ▁akawa ambia , ▁" M imi ▁ndimi ▁njia ▁na ▁kweli ▁na ▁uzima . ▁Mtu ▁ha wezi ▁kuja ▁kwa ▁Baba ▁isipokuwa ▁kwa ▁kupitia ▁kwangu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kama ▁mng eni jua ▁mimi , ▁mng em jua ▁na ▁Baba ▁pia . ▁T angu ▁sasa , ▁m nam jua ▁Baba ▁yangu , ▁tena ▁mm em wona . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Filipo ▁akam wambia , ▁" B wana , ▁tu ony eshe ▁Baba ▁yako ▁yat osha . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Yesu ▁akam jibu , ▁" Fili po , ▁nim ekaa ▁nanyi ▁muda ▁huu ▁wote ▁hata ▁us ini jue ? ▁Mtu ▁yeyote ▁ali yeni ona ▁mimi , ▁am em wona ▁Baba . ▁Sasa ▁wa weza je ▁kusema , ▁' Tu ony eshe ▁Baba '? </s> swh_Latn
▁Je , ▁hu amini ▁ya ▁kuwa ▁mimi ▁niko ▁ndani ▁ya ▁Baba , ▁naye ▁Baba ▁yuko ▁ndani ▁yangu ? ▁Man eno ▁nin ayo wa ambia ▁siyas emi ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yangu ▁mwenyewe , ▁bali ▁Baba ▁aka aye ▁ndani ▁yangu ▁ndiye ▁atend aye ▁hizi ▁kazi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nis ad iki ▁mimi ▁kwamba ▁niko ▁ndani ▁ya ▁Baba ▁na ▁Baba ▁yuko ▁ndani ▁yangu , ▁la ▁si vyo , ▁ni amin ini ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ya ▁zile ▁kazi ▁ni zit enda zo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Amin , ▁amin ▁nawa ambia , ▁yeyote ▁ani amini ye ▁mimi , ▁kazi ▁ni zi fanya zo ▁yeye ▁ata zi fanya , ▁naam ▁na ▁kubwa ▁kuliko ▁hizi ▁ata zi fanya , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁mimi ▁nin ak wenda ▁kwa ▁Baba . </s> swh_Latn
▁N anyi ▁m ki omba ▁lolote ▁kwa ▁Jina ▁langu , ▁hilo ▁nita lif anya , ▁ili ▁Baba ▁ap ate ▁kutuk u zwa ▁katika ▁Mwana . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kama ▁mk ini omba ▁lolote ▁kwa ▁Jina ▁langu ▁nita lif anya . </s> swh_Latn
▁" K ama ▁mn anip enda , ▁m taz ishika ▁amri ▁zangu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nami ▁nit am w omba ▁Baba , ▁naye ▁atawa pa ▁M sa idi zi ▁mwingine ▁aka e ▁nanyi ▁milele . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hu yo ▁ndiye ▁Roho ▁wa ▁kweli ▁ambaye ▁ulimwengu ▁hau wezi ▁kum pok ea , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ha um woni ▁wala ▁ha um jui . ▁Nin yi ▁m nam jua ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁yuko ▁pamoja ▁nanyi ▁naye ▁an akaa ▁ndani ▁yenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Sita wa acha ▁ninyi ▁yat ima , ▁na ja ▁kwenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bado ▁kit ambo ▁kidogo ▁ulimwengu ▁haut ani ona ▁tena , ▁ila ▁ninyi ▁mt ani ona , ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁mimi ▁ni ▁hai , ▁ninyi ▁nanyi ▁mt akuwa ▁hai . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wakati ▁huo ▁m taj ua ▁ya ▁kuwa ▁mimi ▁niko ▁ndani ▁ya ▁Baba ▁na ▁ninyi ▁m ko ▁ndani ▁yangu ▁na ▁mimi ▁niko ▁ndani ▁yenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ye yote ▁mwenye ▁amri ▁zangu ▁na ▁kuz ishika ▁ndiye ▁an ip end aye , ▁naye ▁an ip end aye ▁ata pend wa ▁na ▁Baba ▁yangu , ▁nami ▁nit amp enda ▁na ▁kuj idhi hir isha ▁kwake . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁Yuda , ▁siyo ▁Isk ario te , ▁akam wambia , ▁" B wana , ▁itakuwa je ▁kwamba ▁uta j idhi hir isha ▁kwetu ▁na ▁si ▁kwa ▁ulimwengu ?" </s> swh_Latn
▁Yesu ▁akam jibu , ▁" M tu ▁yeyote ▁ak inip enda ▁atal ishika ▁neno ▁langu ▁na ▁Baba ▁yangu ▁at amp enda , ▁nasi ▁tut akuja ▁kwake ▁na ▁kufanya ▁makao ▁yetu ▁kwake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mtu ▁yeyote ▁asi yeni penda ▁hay ash iki ▁maneno ▁yangu ▁na ▁maneno ▁nili yowa pa ▁si ▁yangu ▁bali ▁ni ▁ya ▁Baba ▁ali yen ituma . </s> swh_Latn
▁" N ime wa ambia ▁mambo ▁haya ▁yote ▁wakati ▁bado ▁niko ▁pamoja ▁nanyi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁huyo ▁M sa idi zi , ▁yaani , ▁huyo ▁Roho ▁Mtakatifu , ▁ambaye ▁Baba ▁at amt uma ▁kwenu ▁kwa ▁Jina ▁langu , ▁atawa fundisha ▁mambo ▁yote ▁na ▁kuwak umbusha ▁yote ▁nili yowa ambia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Am ani ▁nawa ach ia , ▁amani ▁yangu ▁nawa pa , ▁amani ▁hii ▁ni wap ayo ▁si ▁kama ▁ile ▁ulimwengu ▁uto ayo . ▁M sif adha ike ▁mi oy oni ▁mwen u , ▁wala ▁msi og ope . </s> swh_Latn
▁" M lin is ikia ▁nik isema , ▁' N inak wenda ▁zangu , ▁lakini ▁nit aru di ▁tena .' ▁Kama ▁kweli ▁mng elini penda ▁mng eli furahi ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁na enda ▁kwa ▁Baba , ▁kwani ▁Baba ▁ni ▁mkuu ▁kun ili ko ▁mimi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nime wa ambia ▁mambo ▁haya ▁kabla ▁haya jat ukia , ▁ili ▁yat akap ot ukia ▁mpate ▁ku amini . </s> swh_Latn
▁S itas ema ▁nanyi ▁zaidi , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁yule ▁mkuu ▁wa ▁ulimwengu ▁huu ▁an akuja , ▁naye ▁hana ▁kitu ▁kwangu , </s> swh_Latn
▁lakini ▁ulimwengu ▁up ate ▁kujua ▁kuwa ▁nin amp enda ▁Baba , ▁nami ▁hufanya ▁vile ▁Baba ▁ali vy oni am uru . ▁" H aya ▁in ukeni ; ▁tw end eni ▁zetu . </s> swh_Latn
▁" M imi ▁ndimi ▁m za bibu ▁wa ▁kweli ▁na ▁Baba ▁yangu ▁ndiye ▁mku lima . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kila ▁tawi ▁ndani ▁yangu ▁lis ilo zaa ▁matunda , ▁Baba ▁yangu ▁hu lik ata , ▁nalo ▁kila ▁tawi ▁li za alo , ▁hul isa fisha ▁ili ▁lip ate ▁kuza a ▁matunda ▁zaidi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nin yi ▁mmek wisha ▁kuwa ▁safi ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ya ▁lile ▁neno ▁ni lil on ena ▁nanyi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ka eni ▁ndani ▁yangu , ▁nami ▁nika e ▁ndani ▁yenu . ▁Kama ▁vile ▁tawi ▁lisi vyo weza ▁kuza a ▁matunda ▁l isip okaa ▁ndani ▁ya ▁m za bibu , ▁vi vyo ▁hivyo ▁ninyi ▁m sip okaa ▁ndani ▁yangu ▁hamwe zi ▁kuza a ▁matunda . </s> swh_Latn
▁" M imi ▁ni ▁m za bibu , ▁ninyi ▁ni ▁mata wi . ▁Aka aye ▁ndani ▁yangu , ▁nami ▁ndani ▁yake , ▁huyo ▁hu zaa ▁sana , ▁maana ▁pasi po ▁mimi ▁ninyi ▁hamwe zi ▁kufanya ▁jambo ▁lolote . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mtu ▁yeyote ▁asi p okaa ▁ndani ▁yangu , ▁hut upwa ▁nje ▁kama ▁tawi ▁na ▁kunya uka . ▁Mata wi ▁kama ▁hayo ▁huk us anywa ▁na ▁kutu pwa ▁mot oni , ▁yak atek etea . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nin yi ▁mk ikaa ▁ndani ▁yangu ▁na ▁maneno ▁yangu ▁yak ikaa ▁ndani ▁yenu , ▁om beni ▁lolote ▁m tak alo , ▁nanyi ▁m tat ende wa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁Baba ▁yangu ▁h utuku zwa , ▁kwa ▁vile ▁m za av yo ▁matunda ▁mengi , ▁nanyi ▁mt akuwa ▁wanafunzi ▁wangu . </s> swh_Latn
▁" K ama ▁vile ▁Baba ▁ali vy oni penda ▁mimi , ▁hivyo ▁ndivyo ▁mimi ▁nili vyo wap enda ▁ninyi . ▁Basi ▁ka eni ▁katika ▁p endo ▁langu . </s> swh_Latn
▁M kiz ishika ▁amri ▁zangu ▁mt akaa ▁katika ▁p endo ▁langu , ▁kama ▁mimi ▁nili vyo z ishika ▁amri ▁za ▁Baba ▁yangu ▁na ▁kukaa ▁katika ▁p endo ▁lake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nime wa ambia ▁mambo ▁haya ▁ili ▁furaha ▁yangu ▁iwe ▁ndani ▁yenu ▁na ▁furaha ▁yenu ▁iwe ▁kamili . </s> swh_Latn
▁Am ri ▁yangu ▁ndiyo ▁hii : ▁M pend ane ▁kama ▁mimi ▁nili vyo wap enda ▁ninyi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hakuna ▁mtu ▁mwenye ▁upendo ▁mkuu ▁kuliko ▁huu , ▁mtu ▁ku utoa ▁uhai ▁wake ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁rafiki ▁zake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nin yi ▁ni ▁rafiki ▁zangu ▁m ki fanya ▁nin ayo wa am uru . </s> swh_Latn
▁Si wa iti ▁ninyi ▁watumishi ▁tena , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁watumishi ▁hawa jui ▁bwana ▁wao ▁analo fanya , ▁bali ▁nime wa ita ▁ninyi ▁rafiki , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁nime wa jul isha ▁mambo ▁yote ▁nili yo yas ikia ▁kutoka ▁kwa ▁Baba ▁yangu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Si ▁ninyi ▁mli oni chagua , ▁bali ▁mimi ▁ndiye ▁nili ye wach agua ▁ninyi ▁na ▁kuwa weka ▁mw ende ▁mka za e ▁matunda , ▁na ▁matunda ▁yenu ▁yap ate ▁kud umu . ▁Ili ▁nalo ▁lolote ▁m tak alom w omba ▁Baba ▁katika ▁Jina ▁langu , ▁awa pe ▁ninyi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Am ri ▁yangu ▁ndiyo ▁hii : ▁M pend ane . </s> swh_Latn
▁" K ama ▁ulimwengu ▁uki wach ukia ▁ninyi , ▁kum buk eni ▁kwamba ▁ul ini ch ukia ▁mimi ▁kabla ▁yenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kama ▁mng ekuwa ▁wa ▁ulimwengu , ▁ulimwengu ▁unge liwa penda ▁kama ▁vile ▁una vyo wap enda ▁walio ▁wake . ▁Kwa ▁sababu ▁ninyi ▁si ▁wa ▁ulimwengu , ▁lakini ▁mimi ▁nime wach agua ▁kutoka ▁ulimwengu , ▁hii ▁ndiyo ▁sababu ▁ulimwengu ▁una wach ukia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kumb ukeni ▁lile ▁neno ▁ni lilo wa ambia , ▁' H akuna ▁mtum ishi ▁aliye ▁mkuu ▁kuliko ▁bwana ▁wake .' ▁Kama ▁wam enit esa ▁mimi , ▁nanyi ▁pia ▁wata wat esa . ▁Kama ▁wam el ishika ▁neno ▁langu , ▁wat al ishika ▁na ▁neno ▁l enu ▁pia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wata wat ende a ▁ninyi ▁haya ▁yote ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁Jina ▁langu , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ha wam jui ▁yeye ▁ali yen ituma . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kama ▁siku ja ▁na ▁kusema ▁nao ▁was inga likuwa ▁na ▁hat ia ▁ya ▁dhambi . ▁Lakini ▁sasa ▁hawana ▁udh uru ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁dhambi ▁zao . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ye yote ▁anay eni ch ukia ▁mimi , ▁anam ch ukia ▁pia ▁na ▁Baba ▁yangu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kama ▁siku wa ▁nime fanya ▁mi uji za ▁ambayo ▁hai jap ata ▁kuf anywa ▁na ▁mtu ▁mwingine ▁yeyote , ▁was inga likuwa ▁na ▁hat ia ▁ya ▁dhambi . ▁Lakini ▁sasa ▁wame i ona ▁mi uji za ▁hii ▁na ▁bado ▁wakatu ch ukia ▁mimi ▁na ▁Baba ▁yangu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁hii ▁ni ▁kutimiza ▁lile ▁neno ▁lililo andikwa ▁kwenye ▁Sheria ▁kwamba , ▁' Wal ini ch ukia ▁pasi po ▁sababu .' </s> swh_Latn
▁" L akini ▁at akap oku ja ▁huyo ▁M sa idi zi ▁nit akay emt uma ▁kwenu ▁kutoka ▁kwa ▁Baba , ▁yaani , ▁huyo ▁Roho ▁wa ▁kweli ▁atok aye ▁kwa ▁Baba , ▁yeye ▁at anis huh udia ▁mimi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nin yi ▁nanyi ▁ita wa pasa ▁kus huh udia ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁mm ekuwa ▁pamoja ▁nami ▁tangu ▁mwanzo . </s> swh_Latn
▁" N ime wa ambia ▁mambo ▁haya ▁yote ▁ili ▁msi je ▁mka ia cha ▁imani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wata wat enga ▁na ▁masin ag ogi . ▁Naam , ▁saa ▁ya ja ▁ambayo ▁mtu ▁yeyote ▁atak aye wa ua ▁at adhani ▁kwa ▁kufanya ▁hivyo ▁anam tumikia ▁Mungu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nao ▁wata wat enda ▁haya ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ha wam jui ▁Baba ▁wala ▁mimi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁nime wa ambia ▁ninyi ▁mambo ▁haya , ▁ili ▁saa ▁hiyo ▁iki wad ia ▁mpate ▁kuk umbuka ▁ya ▁kuwa ▁nilikuwa ▁nime wa ambia . ▁Siku wa ambia ▁mambo ▁haya ▁tangu ▁mwanzo ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁nilikuwa ▁pamoja ▁nanyi . </s> swh_Latn
▁" S asa ▁mimi ▁nin ak wenda ▁kwake ▁yeye ▁ali yen ituma , ▁lakini ▁hakuna ▁hata ▁ani uli z aye , ▁' U nak wenda ▁wapi ?' </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁sababu ▁nime wa ambia ▁mambo ▁haya , ▁mioyo ▁yenu ▁ime jawa ▁na ▁hu zuni . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁nawa ambia ▁kweli , ▁ya faa ▁mimi ▁ni ond oke , ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁nisi po ondoka , ▁huyo ▁M sa idi zi ▁hat akuja ▁kwenu , ▁lakini ▁niki enda ▁nit amt uma ▁kwenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Naye ▁at akap oku ja , ▁ata uthi bit ishia ▁ulimwengu ▁kuhusu ▁dhambi , ▁haki ▁na ▁hukumu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁habari ▁ya ▁dhambi , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ha wani amini ▁mimi , </s> swh_Latn
▁kwa ▁habari ▁ya ▁haki , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁nin ak wenda ▁kwa ▁Baba , ▁nanyi ▁ham tani ona ▁tena , </s> swh_Latn
▁kwa ▁habari ▁ya ▁hukumu , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁yule ▁mkuu ▁wa ▁ulimwengu ▁huu ▁amek wisha ▁kuh uk umiwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁" B ado ▁nin ayo ▁mambo ▁mengi ▁ya ▁kuwa ambia , ▁lakini ▁hamwe zi ▁kuy asta him ili ▁sasa . </s> swh_Latn
▁At akap oku ja ▁huyo ▁Roho ▁wa ▁kweli ▁atawa ongoza ▁aw atie ▁katika ▁kweli ▁yote . ▁Yeye ▁h atan ena ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yake ▁mwenyewe , ▁bali ▁atan ena ▁yale ▁yote ▁at akay os ikia , ▁naye ▁atawa onyesha ▁mambo ▁ya j ayo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Atan it uku za ▁mimi , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁ata ya chukua ▁yaliyo ▁yangu ▁na ▁kuwa jul isha ▁ninyi . </s> swh_Latn
▁V yote ▁alivyo ▁navyo ▁Baba ▁ni ▁v yangu . ▁Ndiyo ▁maana ▁nim esema ▁Roho ▁ata chukua ▁yaliyo ▁yangu ▁na ▁kuwa jul isha ▁ninyi . </s> swh_Latn
▁" B ado ▁kit ambo ▁kidogo ▁nanyi ▁ham tani ona ▁na ▁tena ▁bado ▁kit ambo ▁kidogo ▁nanyi ▁mt ani ona . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Baadhi ▁ya ▁wanafunzi ▁waka uli zana , ▁" Ana ▁maana ▁gani ▁asem apo , ▁' B ado ▁kit ambo ▁kidogo ▁nanyi ▁ham tani ona ▁na ▁tena ▁bado ▁kit ambo ▁kidogo ▁nanyi ▁mt ani ona '? ▁Naye ▁ana ▁maana ▁gani ▁asem apo , ▁' Kwa ▁sababu ▁nin ak wenda ▁kwa ▁Baba '?" </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka endelea ▁ku uli zana , ▁" Ana ▁maana ▁gani ▁asem apo , ▁' Kit ambo ▁kidogo '? ▁H atu ele wi ▁hilo ▁anal osema . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Yesu ▁akat ambua ▁kuwa ▁walit aka ▁kum uu liza ▁juu ▁ya ▁hilo , ▁hivyo ▁akawa ambia , ▁" Je , ▁mna uli zana ▁nina ▁maana ▁gani ▁nili pos ema , ▁' B ado ▁kit ambo ▁kidogo ▁nanyi ▁ham tani ona ▁na ▁tena ▁bado ▁kit ambo ▁kidogo ▁nanyi ▁mt ani ona '? </s> swh_Latn
▁Amin , ▁amin ▁nawa ambia , ▁ninyi ▁mta lia ▁na ▁ku ombo leza , ▁lakini ▁ulimwengu ▁uta furahi . ▁Nin yi ▁mta hu zun ika , ▁lakini ▁hu zuni ▁yenu ▁ita ge uka ▁kuwa ▁furaha . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mwan amke ▁anap okuwa ▁na ▁ut ungu ▁wa ▁kuza a ▁huwa ▁na ▁maumivu ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁saa ▁yake ▁ime wad ia . ▁Lakini ▁mtoto ▁aki isha ▁ku zaliwa , ▁yule ▁mwanamke ▁h usa hau ▁maumivu ▁hayo ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ya ▁furaha ▁ya ▁ku zaliwa ▁mtoto ▁ulimwenguni . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hivyo ▁ninyi ▁mna ▁maumivu ▁sasa , ▁lakini ▁nita wa ona ▁tena , ▁nayo ▁mioyo ▁yenu ▁ita furahi ▁na ▁furaha ▁yenu ▁hakuna ▁awa ondo le aye . </s> swh_Latn
▁Katika ▁siku ▁hiyo ▁ham tani uliza ▁neno ▁lolote . ▁Amin , ▁amin ▁nawa ambia , ▁kama ▁mk im w omba ▁Baba ▁jambo ▁lolote ▁kwa ▁jina ▁langu , ▁yeye ▁atawa pa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mpaka ▁sasa ▁ham ja omba ▁jambo ▁lolote ▁kwa ▁Jina ▁langu . ▁Omb eni ▁nanyi ▁mta pewa , ▁ili ▁furaha ▁yenu ▁ip ate ▁kuwa ▁kamili . </s> swh_Latn
▁" N ime wa ambia ▁mambo ▁haya ▁kwa ▁ma fumbo . ▁Saa ▁ya ja ▁ambapo ▁sita zungumza ▁nanyi ▁tena ▁kwa ▁ma fumbo ▁bali ▁nita wa eleza ▁wazi wazi ▁kuhusu ▁Baba . </s> swh_Latn
▁Siku ▁hiyo ▁mta omba ▁kwa ▁Jina ▁langu . ▁Wala ▁sita wa ambia ▁kwamba ▁nit am w omba ▁Baba ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yenu , </s> swh_Latn
▁kwa ▁maana ▁Baba ▁mwenyewe ▁ana wap enda , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁mm eni penda ▁mimi ▁na ▁mme amini ▁kwamba ▁nimet oka ▁kwa ▁Mungu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ni lit oka ▁kwa ▁Baba ▁na ▁kuja ▁ulimwenguni , ▁sasa ▁na ondoka ▁ulimwenguni ▁na ▁kurudi ▁kwa ▁Baba . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁wanafunzi ▁wake ▁wak asema , ▁" S asa ▁una zungumza ▁wazi wazi , ▁wala ▁si ▁kwa ▁ma fumbo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Sasa ▁tume jua ▁kwamba ▁wewe ▁una jua ▁mambo ▁yote , ▁wala ▁hakuna ▁haja ▁ya ▁mtu ▁kuku uliza ▁maswali . ▁Kwa ▁jambo ▁hili ▁tuna amini ▁kwamba ▁ulit oka ▁kwa ▁Mungu . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Yesu ▁akawa jibu , ▁" Je , ▁sasa ▁m naam ini ? </s> swh_Latn

▁wala ▁tumaini ▁halit ukat ishi ▁tamaa , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁Mungu ▁amek wisha ▁kum imina ▁p endo ▁lake ▁mi oy oni ▁mw etu ▁kwa ▁njia ▁ya ▁Roho ▁Mtakatifu ▁ambaye ▁amet up atia . </s> swh_Latn

▁Lakini ▁na uliza : ▁Je , ▁wao ▁hawak us ikia ? ▁Naam , ▁wam es ikia , ▁kwa ▁maana : ▁" Sa uti ▁yao ▁ime enea ▁duniani ▁pote , ▁nayo ▁maneno ▁yao ▁yame enea ▁hadi ▁mi isho ▁ya ▁ulimwengu . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Nami ▁na uliza ▁tena : ▁Je , ▁Waisraeli ▁hawaku elewa ? ▁Kwanza , ▁Mose ▁asema , ▁" N ita wa fanya ▁mwe ▁na ▁w ivu ▁kwa ▁watu ▁wale ▁ambao ▁si ▁taifa . ▁N ita wak asir isha ▁kwa ▁taifa ▁lile ▁lis ilo ▁na ▁u fahamu . " </s> swh_Latn

▁Mtu ▁mmoja ▁imani ▁yake ▁inam ruh usu ▁kula ▁kila ▁kitu , ▁lakini ▁mwingine ▁ambaye ▁imani ▁yake ▁ni ▁dha i fu , ▁hula ▁mbo ga ▁tu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yeye ▁alaye ▁kila ▁kitu ▁asim dh arau ▁yeye ▁asi yek ula . ▁Wala ▁yeye ▁asi yek ula ▁kila ▁kitu ▁as imh ukumu ▁yule ▁alaye ▁kila ▁kitu , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁Mungu ▁am em ku bali . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wewe ▁ni ▁nani ▁hata ▁um huk umu ▁mtum ishi ▁wa ▁mtu ▁mwingine ? ▁Kwa ▁bwana ▁wake ▁tu ▁an asim ama ▁au ▁ku anguka . ▁Naye ▁atas imama ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁Bwana ▁anaweza ▁kum sim am isha . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mtu ▁mmoja ▁ana it uku za ▁siku ▁fulani ▁kuwa ▁ni ▁bora ▁kuliko ▁nyingine , ▁na ▁mwingine ▁anaona ▁kuwa ▁siku ▁zote ▁ni ▁sawa . ▁Basi ▁kila ▁mmoja ▁awe ▁na ▁hakika ▁na ▁yale ▁an ayo amini . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yeye ▁anay eh esa bu ▁siku ▁moja ▁kuwa ▁takatifu ▁kuliko ▁nyingine , ▁hufanya ▁hivyo ▁kwa ▁kum hesh imu ▁Bwana . ▁Naye ▁alaye ▁nyama ▁hula ▁kwa ▁Bwana , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁hum sh ukuru ▁Mungu , ▁naye ▁akata aye ▁kula ▁nyama ▁hufanya ▁hivyo ▁kwa ▁Bwana ▁na ▁hum sh ukuru ▁Mungu . </s> swh_Latn

▁M si we ▁kik wazo ▁kwa ▁mtu ▁yeyote , ▁wawe ▁Wayahudi ▁au ▁Way unani , ▁au ▁kwa ▁kanisa ▁la ▁Mungu , </s> swh_Latn
▁kama ▁hata ▁mimi ▁nina vyo jaribu ▁kump endeza ▁kila ▁mtu ▁kwa ▁kila ▁namna . ▁Kwa ▁maana ▁sita futi ▁mema ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yangu ▁mwenyewe ▁bali ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁wengi , ▁ili ▁wawe ze ▁ku oko lewa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ig eni ▁mfano ▁wangu , ▁kama ▁nina vy ou iga ▁mfano ▁wa ▁Kristo . </s> swh_Latn
▁N inaw asi fu ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁m nan ik umbuka ▁katika ▁kila ▁jambo ▁na ▁kwa ▁kush ika ▁mafundisho ▁nili yowa pa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nap enda ▁mfa hamu ▁kwamba ▁kichwa ▁cha ▁kila ▁mwana ume ▁ni ▁Kristo , ▁na ▁kichwa ▁cha ▁mwanamke ▁ni ▁mwana ume , ▁nacho ▁kichwa ▁cha ▁Kristo ▁ni ▁Mungu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kila ▁mwana ume ▁anaye omba ▁au ▁kutoa ▁unabii ▁akiwa ▁ame funika ▁kichwa ▁chake , ▁anak ia ib isha ▁kichwa ▁chake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Naye ▁kila ▁mwanamke ▁anaye omba ▁au ▁kutoa ▁unabii ▁pasi po ▁kufunika ▁kichwa ▁chake , ▁anak ia ib isha ▁kichwa ▁chake , ▁kwani ▁ni ▁sawa ▁na ▁yeye ▁ali yen yo a ▁ny wele . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kama ▁mwanamke ▁hata ji funika ▁kichwa ▁chake , ▁basi ▁in amp asa ▁kun yo a ▁ny wele ▁zake . ▁Lakini ▁kama ▁ni ▁ai bu ▁kwa ▁mwanamke ▁kukata ▁au ▁kun yo a ▁ny wele ▁zake , ▁basi ▁af un ike ▁kichwa ▁chake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ha imp asi ▁mwana ume ▁kufunika ▁kichwa ▁chake ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁ni ▁mfano ▁wa ▁Mungu ▁na ▁utukufu ▁wa ▁Mungu , ▁lakini ▁mwanamke ▁ni ▁utukufu ▁wa ▁mwana ume . </s> swh_Latn

▁Kwa ▁sababu ▁hii ▁na ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ya ▁malaika , ▁in amp asa ▁mwanamke ▁awe ▁na ▁ishara ▁ya ▁mamlaka ▁juu ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁katika ▁Bwana , ▁mwanamke ▁ha jit eg eme i ▁pasi po ▁mwana ume ▁na ▁mwana ume ▁ha jit eg eme i ▁pasi po ▁mwanamke . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kama ▁vile ▁mwanamke ▁alivyo umbwa ▁kutoka ▁kwa ▁mwana ume , ▁vi vyo ▁hivyo ▁mwana ume ▁hu zaliwa ▁na ▁mwanamke . ▁Lakini ▁vitu ▁vyote ▁vy at oka ▁kwa ▁Mungu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hukum uni ▁ninyi ▁wenyewe : ▁Je , ▁ina faa ▁kwa ▁mwanamke ▁kumw omba ▁Mungu ▁bila ▁kufunika ▁kichwa ▁chake ? </s> swh_Latn
▁Je , ▁maum bile ▁ya ▁asili ▁hay atu fund ishi ▁kuwa ▁ni ▁ai bu ▁kwa ▁mwana ume ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ny wele ▁nde fu ? </s> swh_Latn

▁Lakini ▁badala ▁yake , ▁vile ▁vi ungo ▁vya ▁mwili ▁vina vyo onekana ▁kuwa ▁dha i fu , ▁ndivyo ▁ambavyo ▁ni ▁vya ▁muhimu ▁sana . </s> swh_Latn
▁Na vyo ▁vile ▁vi ungo ▁tuna vy ovi ona ▁hav ina ▁heshima , ▁ndivyo ▁tuna vi pa ▁heshima ▁maal um . ▁V ile ▁vi ungo ▁vya ▁mwili ▁ambavyo ▁hav ina ▁uz uri , ▁tuna vi pa ▁heshima ▁ya ▁pekee ; </s> swh_Latn
▁wakati ▁vile ▁vi ungo ▁vy enye ▁uz uri ▁havi hitaji ▁ut unza ji ▁wa ▁pekee . ▁Lakini ▁Mungu ▁ame vi weka ▁pamoja ▁vi ungo ▁vya ▁mwili ▁na ▁aka vi pa ▁heshima ▁zaidi ▁vile ▁vili vy op ung ukiwa , </s> swh_Latn
▁ili ▁pasi we ▁na ▁mafar ak ano ▁katika ▁mwili , ▁bali ▁vi ungo ▁vyote ▁vi hud umi ane ▁kwa ▁usa wa ▁kila ▁kimoja ▁na ▁mwen zake . </s> swh_Latn

▁Ning ekuwa ▁na ▁karama ▁ya ▁unabii ▁na ▁kujua ▁siri ▁zote ▁na ▁maari fa ▁yote , ▁hata ▁kama ▁nina ▁imani ▁kiasi ▁cha ▁ku weza ▁ku ham isha ▁mili ma , ▁kama ▁sina ▁upendo , ▁mimi ▁si ▁kitu . </s> swh_Latn

▁Ha uk osi ▁kuwa ▁na ▁ada bu , ▁hauta futi ▁mambo ▁yake , ▁ha ukas iriki ▁up esi , ▁hau weki ▁kumb ukumbu ▁ya ▁mabaya . </s> swh_Latn

▁Basi ▁sasa , ▁yan ad umu ▁mambo ▁haya ▁matatu : ▁Im ani , ▁tumaini ▁na ▁upendo . ▁Lakini ▁lililo ▁kuu ▁miongoni ▁mwa ▁haya ▁matatu ▁ni ▁upendo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Fu at eni ▁upendo ▁na ▁kut aka ▁sana ▁karama ▁za ▁roho , ▁hasa ▁karama ▁ya ▁unabii . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁maana ▁mtu ▁yeyote ▁anay esema ▁kwa ▁lugha , ▁has emi ▁na ▁wanadamu ▁bali ▁anasema ▁na ▁Mungu . ▁Kwa ▁kuwa ▁hakuna ▁mtu ▁yeyote ▁anay em wele wa , ▁kwani ▁anasema ▁mambo ▁ya ▁siri ▁kwa ▁roho . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁anay etoa ▁unabii ▁anasema ▁na ▁watu ▁akiwa jenga , ▁kuwat ia ▁moyo ▁na ▁kuwa fari ji . </s> swh_Latn
▁An en aye ▁kwa ▁lugha ▁hu ji jenga ▁mwenyewe , ▁bali ▁ato aye ▁unabii ▁huli jenga ▁kanisa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ning ep enda ▁kila ▁mmoja ▁wenu ▁anene ▁kwa ▁lugha ▁lakini ▁ning ep enda ▁zaidi ▁nyo te ▁m toe ▁unabii . ▁Kwa ▁kuwa ▁yeye ▁ato aye ▁unabii ▁ni ▁mkuu ▁kuliko ▁an en aye ▁kwa ▁lugha , ▁isipokuwa ▁ata fs iri , ▁ili ▁kanisa ▁lip ate ▁kuj engwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Sasa ▁ndugu ▁zangu , ▁kama ▁niki ja ▁kwenu ▁nik asema ▁kwa ▁lugha ▁mpya ▁nita wa fa idia ▁nini ▁kama ▁siku wale tea ▁uf unuo ▁au ▁neno ▁la ▁maari fa ▁au ▁unabii ▁au ▁mafundisho ? </s> swh_Latn

▁kum buk eni ▁kwamba ▁wakati ▁ule ▁m likuwa ▁mbali ▁na ▁Kristo , ▁m kiwa ▁mm et engwa ▁kutoka ▁jum uiya ▁ya ▁Israeli , ▁na ▁m kiwa ▁wag eni ▁katika ▁yale ▁maag ano ▁ya ▁ahadi , ▁nanyi ▁m kiwa ▁ham na ▁tumaini ▁wala ▁Mungu ▁duniani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁sasa ▁katika ▁Kristo ▁Yesu , ▁ninyi ▁ambao ▁hapo ▁kwanza ▁m likuwa ▁mbali ▁na ▁Mungu , ▁sasa ▁mme let wa ▁karibu ▁kwa ▁njia ▁ya ▁damu ▁ya ▁Kristo . </s> swh_Latn

▁Basi , ▁kama ▁vile ▁Kanisa ▁lina vy om tii ▁Kristo , ▁vi vyo ▁hivyo ▁na ▁wake ▁nao ▁ime wa pasa ▁kuw atii ▁wa ume ▁zao ▁kwa ▁kila ▁jambo . </s> swh_Latn

▁kusudi ▁ali fanye ▁takatifu , ▁aki lit akasa ▁kwa ▁kuli osha ▁kwa ▁maji ▁katika ▁Neno ▁lake , </s> swh_Latn
▁ap ate ▁kuji le tea ▁Kanisa ▁tuku fu ▁lis ilo ▁na ▁doa ▁wala ▁kun yan zi ▁au ▁waa ▁lolote , ▁bali ▁takatifu ▁na ▁lis ilo ▁na ▁hat ia . </s> swh_Latn
▁V ivyo ▁hivyo ▁ime wa pasa ▁wa ume ▁kuwa penda ▁wake ▁zao ▁kama ▁miili ▁yao ▁wenyewe . ▁Am pend aye ▁mke we ▁hu jip enda ▁mwenyewe . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hakuna ▁mtu ▁anaye uch ukia ▁mwili ▁wake ▁mwenyewe , ▁bali ▁hu ul isha ▁na ▁ku utun za ▁vizuri , ▁kama ▁Kristo ▁ana vyo lit unza ▁Kanisa ▁lake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Sisi ▁tu ▁vi ungo ▁vya ▁mwili ▁wake . </s> swh_Latn
▁" Kwa ▁sababu ▁hii , ▁mwana ume ▁at amwa cha ▁baba ▁yake ▁na ▁mama ▁yake , ▁naye ▁ata amb atana ▁na ▁mke we , ▁na ▁hao ▁wawili ▁wat akuwa ▁mwili ▁mmoja . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Siri ▁hii ▁ni ▁kubwa , ▁bali ▁mimi ▁nan ena ▁kuhusu ▁Kristo ▁na ▁Kanisa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hata ▁hivyo , ▁kila ▁mmoja ▁wenu ▁amp ende ▁mke we ▁kama ▁ana vyo ip enda ▁nafsi ▁yake ▁mwenyewe , ▁naye ▁mke ▁lazima ▁amh esh imu ▁mume we . </s> swh_Latn

▁" Wah esh imu ▁baba ▁yako ▁na ▁mama ▁yako , " ▁hii ▁ndio ▁amri ▁ya ▁kwanza ▁yenye ▁ahadi , </s> swh_Latn
▁" up ate ▁baraka ▁na ▁u ishi ▁siku ▁nyingi ▁duniani . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Nin yi ▁akina ▁baba , ▁msi wach oko ze ▁watoto ▁wenu , ▁bali ▁wale eni ▁kwa ▁n idh amu ▁na ▁mafundisho ▁ya ▁Bwana . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nin yi ▁wat umwa , ▁wati ini ▁hao ▁walio ▁mab wana ▁zenu ▁hapa ▁duniani ▁kwa ▁heshima ▁na ▁kwa ▁kut etem eka ▁na ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁mmoja , ▁kama ▁vile ▁mna vy om tii ▁Kristo . </s> swh_Latn
▁W ati ini , ▁si ▁tu ▁wakati ▁wakiwa ona ▁ili ▁mpate ▁up endeleo ▁wao , ▁bali ▁mtum ike ▁kama ▁wat umwa ▁wa ▁Kristo , ▁m ki fanya ▁mapenzi ▁ya ▁Mungu ▁kwa ▁moyo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Tum ik eni ▁kwa ▁moyo ▁wote , ▁kama ▁vile ▁m nam tumikia ▁Bwana ▁na ▁si ▁wanadamu . </s> swh_Latn
▁M ki jua ▁kwamba ▁Bwana ▁at ampa ▁kila ▁mtu ▁tha wabu ▁kwa ▁lolote ▁jema ▁ali lot enda , ▁kama ▁yeye ▁ni ▁mtum wa ▁au ▁ni ▁mtu ▁huru . </s> swh_Latn
▁N anyi ▁mab wana , ▁wat ende eni ▁wat umwa ▁wenu ▁kwa ▁jinsi ▁iyo ▁hiyo . ▁M si wat ishe , ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁mna jua ▁ya ▁kwamba ▁yeye ▁aliye ▁Bwana ▁wenu ▁na ▁Bwana ▁wao ▁yuko ▁mbinguni , ▁naye ▁hana ▁up endeleo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hat imaye , ▁mz idi ▁kuwa ▁hod ari ▁katika ▁Bwana ▁na ▁katika ▁u weza ▁wa ▁nguvu ▁zake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Va eni ▁sila ha ▁zote ▁za ▁Mungu ▁ili ▁kwamba ▁mwe ze ▁ku zip inga ▁hila ▁za ▁ib ilisi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁maana ▁kus hind ana ▁kwetu ▁si ▁juu ▁ya ▁nyama ▁na ▁damu , ▁bali ▁dhidi ▁ya ▁fal me , ▁mamlaka , ▁dhidi ▁ya ▁waku u ▁wa ▁giza ▁na ▁ma jeshi ▁ya ▁pe po ▁wab aya ▁katika ▁ulimwengu ▁wa ▁roho . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁va eni ▁sila ha ▁zote ▁za ▁Mungu ▁ili ▁mwe ze ▁kus hind ana ▁siku ▁ya ▁u ovu ▁it akap oku ja ▁nanyi ▁m ki isha ▁kufanya ▁yote , ▁sim ameni ▁imara . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁sim ameni ▁imara ▁m kiwa ▁mme ji funga ▁kweli ▁kiun oni ▁na ▁kuva a ▁diri i ▁ya ▁haki ▁ki fu ani , </s> swh_Latn

▁M ki omba ▁kwa ▁Roho ▁siku ▁zote ▁katika ▁sala ▁zote ▁na ▁ma ombi , ▁mk ik esha ▁kila ▁wakati ▁m kiwa ombe a ▁wat akatifu ▁wote . </s> swh_Latn

▁ambayo ▁mimi ▁ni ▁balo zi ▁wake ▁katika ▁vi fungo . ▁Omb eni ▁ili ▁nip ate ▁kuhubiri ▁kwa ▁u jasiri ▁kama ▁in ip asa vyo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Tik iko , ▁aliye ▁ndugu ▁mp endwa ▁na ▁mtum ishi ▁mw aminifu ▁katika ▁Bwana , ▁atawa ambia ▁kila ▁kitu , ▁ili ▁pia ▁mpate ▁kujua ▁hali ▁yangu ▁na ▁kile ▁nina cho fanya ▁sasa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nin amt uma ▁kwenu ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁kusudi ▁hili ▁hasa , ▁ili ▁mpate ▁kujua ▁hali ▁yetu , ▁na ▁aw atie ▁moyo . </s> swh_Latn

▁Ni ▁haki ▁na ▁ni ▁waji bu ▁wangu ▁kufik iri ▁hivi ▁juu ▁yenu ▁nyo te , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ninyi ▁m ko ▁moyoni ▁mw angu . ▁Ikiwa ▁nime fungwa ▁au ▁n ikiwa ▁nina itete a ▁na ▁ku ithi bitisha ▁Injili , ▁ninyi ▁nyo te ▁mn ash iriki ▁ne ema ▁ya ▁Mungu ▁pamoja ▁nami . </s> swh_Latn

▁Lakini ▁in adh uru ▁nini ? ▁Jambo ▁la ▁muhimu ▁ni ▁kwamba ▁kwa ▁kila ▁njia , ▁ikiwa ▁ni ▁kwa ▁nia ▁mbaya ▁au ▁njema , ▁Kristo ▁ana hub iriwa . ▁Nami ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁jambo ▁hilo ▁nina furahi . ▁Naam , ▁nami ▁nita endelea ▁kuf ura hi , </s> swh_Latn

▁Kwa ▁hiyo , ▁nin atuma ini ▁kum tuma ▁kwenu ▁up esi ▁mara ▁nit akap oj ua ▁mambo ▁yangu ▁yat aka vyokuwa . </s> swh_Latn

▁Lakini ▁n adhani ▁ni ▁muhimu ▁kum tuma ▁tena ▁kwenu ▁Epa fr od ito , ▁ndugu ▁yangu ▁na ▁mt end akazi ▁pamoja ▁nami , ▁aliye ▁ask ari ▁mwen z angu , ▁ambaye ▁pia ▁ni ▁m jumbe ▁wenu ▁m liy emt uma ▁ili ▁as hughu like ▁na ▁mahitaji ▁yangu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁maana ▁am ekuwa ▁akiwa onea ▁sana ▁sha uku ▁ninyi ▁nyo te , ▁akiwa ▁na ▁wasiwasi ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁m lis ikia ▁kwamba ▁alikuwa ▁mg onjwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kweli ▁alikuwa ▁mg onjwa , ▁tena ▁karibu ▁ya ▁kufa . ▁Lakini ▁Mungu ▁alim hur umia , ▁wala ▁si ▁yeye ▁tu , ▁bali ▁hata ▁na ▁mimi ▁al ini hur umia , ▁nisi pat we ▁na ▁hu zuni ▁juu ▁ya ▁hu zuni . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁mimi ▁nina fanya ▁bidii ▁kum tuma ▁kwenu ▁ili ▁m tak ap om wona ▁kwa ▁mara ▁nyingine , ▁mpate ▁kuf ura hi , ▁nami ▁wasiwasi ▁wangu ▁up ungue . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁mp oke eni ▁katika ▁Bwana ▁kwa ▁furaha ▁kubwa , ▁nanyi ▁wap eni ▁heshima ▁watu ▁kama ▁hawa , </s> swh_Latn
▁kwa ▁sababu ▁alik ari bia ▁kufa ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁kazi ▁ya ▁Kristo , ▁aki hat ar isha ▁maisha ▁yake ▁ili ▁awe ze ▁kun ih ud umia ▁vile ▁ninyi ▁ham ku weza . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hat imaye , ▁ndugu ▁zangu , ▁fura hini ▁katika ▁Bwana ! ▁Mimi ▁kuwa and ikia ▁mambo ▁yale ▁yale ▁hak uni ud hi , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁ni ▁k inga ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Jih adh ar ini ▁na ▁mbwa , ▁wale ▁wat enda ▁ma ovu , ▁jih adh ar ini ▁na ▁wale ▁wa jik ata o ▁miili ▁yao , ▁was ema o ▁ili ▁ku okoka ▁ni ▁lazima ▁ku tah iriwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁maana ▁sisi ▁ndio ▁tu lio ▁to hara , ▁sisi ▁tum wab udu o ▁Mungu ▁katika ▁Roho , ▁tuna ona ▁fa hari ▁katika ▁Kristo ▁Yesu , ▁ambao ▁hatu weki ▁tumaini ▁letu ▁katika ▁mwili , </s> swh_Latn
▁ingawa ▁mimi ▁mwenyewe ▁nina zo ▁sababu ▁za ▁ku utuma inia ▁mwili . ▁Kama ▁mtu ▁yeyote ▁ak idh ani ▁ana zo ▁sababu ▁za ▁ku utuma inia ▁mwili , ▁mimi ▁zaidi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nili tah iriwa ▁siku ▁ya ▁nane , ▁mimi ▁ni ▁Mwis ra eli ▁wa ▁kabila ▁la ▁Beny amini , ▁M web rania ▁wa ▁Wa eb rania . ▁Kwa ▁habari ▁ya ▁sheria , ▁ni ▁Faris ayo , </s> swh_Latn
▁kwa ▁habari ▁ya ▁ju hudi , ▁nilikuwa ▁na lit esa ▁kanisa , ▁kuhusu ▁haki ▁ipat ikan ayo ▁kwa ▁sheria , ▁mimi ▁nilikuwa ▁sina ▁hat ia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁mambo ▁yale ▁yaliy okuwa ▁faida ▁kwangu , ▁sasa ▁na yah esa bu ▁kuwa ▁has ara ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁Kristo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Zaidi ▁ya ▁hayo , ▁na yah esa bu ▁mambo ▁yote ▁kuwa ▁has ara ▁tupu ▁niki yal ingan isha ▁na ▁faida ▁kubwa ▁ip itayo ▁kiasi ▁cha ▁kum jua ▁Kristo ▁Yesu ▁Bwana ▁wangu , ▁ambaye ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yake ▁nime pata ▁has ara ▁ya ▁mambo ▁yote , ▁niki yah esa bu ▁kuwa ▁kama ▁ma vi ▁ili ▁n imp ate ▁Kristo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nami ▁ni onek ane ▁mbele ▁zake ▁bila ▁kuwa ▁na ▁haki ▁yangu ▁mwenyewe ▁ipat ikan ayo ▁kwa ▁sheria , ▁bali ▁ile ▁ipat ikan ayo ▁kwa ▁imani ▁katika ▁Kristo , ▁haki ▁ile ▁itok ayo ▁kwa ▁Mungu ▁kwa ▁njia ▁ya ▁imani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nat aka ▁nim jue ▁Kristo ▁na ▁u weza ▁wa ▁kufu fuka ▁kwake ▁na ▁us hirika ▁wa ▁mateso ▁yake , ▁ili ▁ni fan ane ▁naye ▁katika ▁ma uti ▁yake , </s> swh_Latn

▁Nd ugu ▁zangu , ▁si jih esa bu ▁kuwa ▁nim ek wisha ▁kush ika . ▁Lakini ▁nina fanya ▁jambo ▁moja : ▁Nin asa hau ▁mambo ▁yale ▁yaliy opita , ▁naka za ▁mw endo ▁kufikia ▁yale ▁yaliyo ▁mbele . </s> swh_Latn

▁kama ▁vile ▁mj ua vyo , ▁tu likuwa ▁tum etes wa ▁na ▁kutuk anwa ▁huko ▁Filipi , ▁lakini ▁hata ▁hivyo , ▁kwa ▁msaada ▁wa ▁Mungu ▁wetu , ▁tu likuwa ▁na ▁u jasiri ▁wa ▁kuwa ambia ▁Injili ▁ya ▁Mungu ▁ingawa ▁kulikuwa ▁na ▁up inzani ▁mkubwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁maana ▁him izo ▁letu ▁halik ut okana ▁na ▁hila ▁wala ▁nia ▁mbaya ▁au ▁ud ang anyi fu . </s> swh_Latn
▁K iny ume ▁chake , ▁tulin ena ▁kama ▁watu ▁tuli oku bali wa ▁na ▁Mungu ▁tuk aka bid hiwa ▁Injili . ▁Sisi ▁hatu jaribu ▁kuwa pende za ▁wanadamu ▁bali ▁kump endeza ▁Mungu , ▁yeye ▁aya ch ungu z aye ▁mawazo ▁ya ▁ndani ▁sana ▁ya ▁mioyo ▁yetu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kama ▁mj ua vyo , ▁hat uku ja ▁kwenu ▁kwa ▁maneno ▁ya ▁kuji pend ekeza ▁au ▁maneno ▁yasiyo ▁ya ▁kweli ▁ili ▁kufi cha ▁tamaa ▁mbaya : ▁Mungu ▁ndiye ▁sha hidi ▁yetu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wala ▁hat ukuwa ▁tun ata futa ▁sifa ▁kutoka ▁kwa ▁wanadamu , ▁wala ▁kutoka ▁kwenu ▁au ▁kwa ▁mtu ▁mwingine ▁awaye ▁yote . ▁Kama ▁mit ume ▁wa ▁Kristo ▁tunga li weza ▁kuwa ▁mz igo ▁kwenu , </s> swh_Latn

▁Tuli wap enda ▁sana ▁kiasi ▁kwamba ▁tu lif ura hia ▁kushiriki ana ▁nanyi , ▁si ▁Injili ▁ya ▁Mungu ▁tu , ▁bali ▁hata ▁maisha ▁yetu , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁m likuwa ▁wa ▁thamani ▁mno ▁kwetu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nd ugu ▁zetu , ▁m nak umbuka ▁ju hudi ▁yetu ▁na ▁taa bu ▁yetu . ▁Tuli fanya ▁kazi ▁usiku ▁na ▁m chana , ▁ili ▁tus im leme e ▁mtu ▁yeyote ▁wa ▁kwenu ▁wakati ▁tulip okuwa ▁tunawa hu bir ia ▁Injili ▁ya ▁Mungu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nin yi ▁wenyewe ▁ni ▁mas hahidi ▁na ▁Mungu ▁pia , ▁jinsi ▁tuli vyokuwa ▁wat akatifu , ▁wenye ▁haki ▁na ▁wasio ▁na ▁law ama ▁miongoni ▁mwen u ▁ninyi ▁m lio amini . </s> swh_Latn

▁Kwa ▁maana ▁ninyi ▁ndugu ▁zetu , ▁m lif anyika ▁wafuasi ▁wa ▁makan isa ▁ya ▁Mungu ▁yaliy oko ▁ndani ▁ya ▁Kristo ▁Yesu ▁katika ▁Uya hudi . ▁M lip ata ▁mateso ▁yale ▁yale ▁kutoka ▁kwa ▁watu ▁wenu ▁wenyewe ▁kama ▁vile ▁makan isa ▁hayo ▁yali vy otes wa ▁na ▁Wayahudi , </s> swh_Latn

▁Pia ▁Mungu ▁ali us huh udia ▁kwa ▁ishara , ▁maa jabu ▁na ▁kwa ▁mi uji za ▁mbalimbali , ▁na ▁karama ▁za ▁Roho ▁Mtakatifu ▁ali zo zi gawa ▁kulingana ▁na ▁mapenzi ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn

▁Lakini ▁kuna ▁mahali ▁mtu ▁fulani ▁am es huh udia ▁ak isema : ▁" M wan adamu ▁ni ▁kitu ▁gani ▁hata ▁un am fikiria , ▁binadamu ▁ni ▁nani ▁hata ▁un am jali ? </s> swh_Latn
▁Um em fanya ▁chini ▁kidogo ▁kuliko ▁malaika ; ▁uk am vika ▁taji ▁ya ▁utukufu ▁na ▁heshima , </s> swh_Latn
▁nawe ▁um ew eka ▁vitu ▁vyote ▁chini ▁ya ▁miguu ▁yake . " ▁Kwa ▁kuweka ▁vitu ▁vyote ▁chini ▁yake , ▁Mungu ▁hak ua cha ▁kitu ▁chochote ▁ambacho ▁hak uki weka ▁chini ▁ya ▁mwanadamu . ▁Lakini ▁kwa ▁sasa , ▁hatu oni ▁kwamba ▁kila ▁kitu ▁kiko ▁chini ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁twam wona ▁Yesu , ▁aliye fanywa ▁chini ▁kidogo ▁kuliko ▁malaika , ▁sasa ▁akiwa ▁ame vik wa ▁taji ▁ya ▁utukufu ▁na ▁heshima ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁al ista him ili ▁ma uti , ▁ili ▁kwamba ▁kwa ▁ne ema ▁ya ▁Mungu ▁ap ate ▁ku onja ▁ma uti ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁kila ▁mtu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ili ▁kuwa leta ▁wana ▁wengi ▁katika ▁utukufu , ▁ili faa ▁kwamba ▁Mungu , ▁ambaye ▁ni ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yake ▁na ▁kupitia ▁kwake ▁kila ▁kitu ▁kim eku wepo , ▁am kam il ishe ▁mwan zilishi ▁wa ▁wok ovu ▁wao ▁kwa ▁njia ▁ya ▁mateso . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yeye ▁awa fany aye ▁watu ▁kuwa ▁wat akatifu , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁hao ▁ambao ▁hu fanywa ▁wat akatifu , ▁wote ▁hut oka ▁katika ▁jamaa ▁moja . ▁Hivyo ▁Yesu ▁ha oni ▁ai bu ▁kuwa ita ▁ndugu ▁zake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yeye ▁hus ema , ▁" N ita lit angaza ▁jina ▁lako ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁zangu ; ▁mbele ▁ya ▁kus anyiko ▁nita imba ▁sifa ▁zako . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Tena , ▁" N ita weka ▁tumaini ▁langu ▁kwake . " ▁Tena ▁anasema , ▁" N iko ▁hapa , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁watoto ▁ambao ▁Mungu ▁am eni pa . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Basi ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁watoto ▁wana ▁nyama ▁na ▁damu , ▁yeye ▁pia ▁al ish iriki ▁katika ▁ub in adamu ▁wao , ▁ili ▁kwa ▁kifo ▁chake , ▁ap ate ▁kum wang amiza ▁huyo ▁mwenye ▁nguvu ▁za ▁ma uti , ▁yaani ▁ib ilisi , </s> swh_Latn
▁na ▁kuwa weka ▁huru ▁wale ▁waliokuwa ▁utum wani ▁maisha ▁yao ▁yote ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ya ▁ku ogopa ▁ma uti . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁kuwa ▁ni ▁dhah iri ▁kwamba ▁haku ja ▁kusaidia ▁malaika , ▁bali ▁uza o ▁wa ▁Abrahamu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁sababu ▁hii ▁ili bidi ▁af an ane ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁kwa ▁kila ▁hali , ▁ili ▁ap ate ▁kuwa ▁Kuh ani ▁Mkuu ▁mwenye ▁huruma ▁na ▁mw aminifu ▁katika ▁kum tumikia ▁Mungu , ▁ili ▁pia ▁ap ate ▁kufanya ▁up atan isho ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁dhambi ▁za ▁watu . </s> swh_Latn

▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁ndugu ▁wat akatifu , ▁mna osh iriki ▁mw ito ▁wa ▁mbinguni , ▁m taf akar ini ▁Yesu , ▁mtume ▁na ▁Kuh ani ▁Mkuu ▁wa ▁uk iri ▁wetu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Alikuwa ▁mw aminifu ▁kwa ▁yeye ▁ali yem weka , ▁kama ▁vile ▁Mose ▁ali vyokuwa ▁mw aminifu ▁katika ▁nyumba ▁yote ▁ya ▁Mungu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yesu ▁ame onekana ▁an asta hili ▁heshima ▁kubwa ▁kuliko ▁Mose , ▁kama ▁vile ▁m jenzi ▁wa ▁nyumba ▁alivyo ▁wa ▁heshima ▁kubwa ▁kuliko ▁nyumba ▁yenye we . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁kuwa ▁kila ▁nyumba ▁hu jeng wa ▁na ▁mtu ▁fulani , ▁lakini ▁Mungu ▁ni ▁m jenzi ▁wa ▁kila ▁kitu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Basi ▁Mose ▁kama ▁mtum ishi ▁alikuwa ▁mw aminifu ▁katika ▁nyumba ▁yote ▁ya ▁Mungu , ▁akis huh udia ▁kwa ▁yale ▁ambayo ▁yang et am kwa ▁baadaye . </s> swh_Latn

▁m sii fanye ▁mioyo ▁yenu ▁mig umu , ▁kama ▁mli vyo fanya ▁katika ▁uasi , ▁wakati ▁ule ▁wa ▁kuj ari biwa ▁jang wani , </s> swh_Latn

▁Kwa ▁hakika , ▁ingawa ▁mpaka ▁wakati ▁huu ▁inge wa pasa ▁kuwa ▁wa limu , ▁bado ▁m nah itaji ▁mtu ▁wa ▁kuwa fundisha ▁tena ▁hatua ▁za ▁awali ▁za ▁kweli ▁ya ▁Neno ▁la ▁Mungu . ▁M nah itaji ▁ma ziwa , ▁wala ▁si ▁chakula ▁kig umu ! </s> swh_Latn

▁Kwa ▁hiyo , ▁tuk ia chana ▁na ▁mafundisho ▁yale ▁ya ▁awali ▁kuhusu ▁Kristo ▁na ▁tuk is onga ▁mbele ▁ili ▁tu fik ie ▁uti mili fu , ▁sio ▁kuweka ▁tena ▁msingi ▁wa ▁mafundisho ▁ya ▁kuzit ub ia ▁kazi ▁zisi zo ▁na ▁uhai ▁na ▁imani ▁katika ▁Mungu , </s> swh_Latn

▁Ar dhi ▁ile ▁ip oke ayo ▁mvua ▁iny esh ayo ▁juu ▁yake ▁mara ▁kwa ▁mara ▁h utoa ▁ma zao ▁yanayo wan ufa isha ▁wale ▁ambao ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yao ▁ya lim wa , ▁nayo ▁nchi ▁hiyo ▁hup okea ▁baraka ▁kutoka ▁kwa ▁Mungu . </s> swh_Latn

▁Ingawa ▁tun asema ▁hivi , ▁ndugu ▁zangu ▁wap endwa , ▁kwa ▁upande ▁wenu ▁tuna ▁hakika ▁ya ▁mambo ▁mema ▁zaidi , ▁mambo ▁yale ▁yah usu yo ▁wok ovu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mungu ▁si ▁m dha limu : ▁yeye ▁hata isa hau ▁kazi ▁yenu ▁na ▁upendo ▁ule ▁m lio onyesha ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yake ▁katika ▁kuwa hud umia ▁wat akatifu ▁na ▁hata ▁sasa ▁mna endelea ▁kuwa hud umia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nasi ▁twat aka ▁kila ▁mmoja ▁wenu ▁a ony eshe ▁bidii ▁iyo ▁hiyo ▁ili ▁mpate ▁kujua ▁uhakika ▁kamili ▁wa ▁lile ▁tumaini ▁mpaka ▁mwisho , </s> swh_Latn
▁ili ▁msi je ▁mka wa ▁wa vi vu , ▁bali ▁mpate ▁kuwa iga ▁wale ▁ambao ▁kwa ▁imani ▁na ▁sab uri ▁hur ithi ▁zile ▁ahadi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mungu ▁ali pom pa ▁Abrahamu ▁ahadi ▁yake , ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁haku wepo ▁mwingine ▁aliyekuwa ▁mkuu ▁kuliko ▁yeye ▁ambaye ▁ange weza ▁ku apa ▁kwa ▁jina ▁lake , ▁ali apa ▁kwa ▁nafsi ▁yake , </s> swh_Latn

▁Kama ▁mna vyo jua , ▁tuna wah esa bu ▁kuwa ▁wa bar ikiwa ▁wale ▁wali ov umi lia . ▁M mes ikia ▁habari ▁za ▁uv um ili vu ▁wake ▁Ayubu ▁na ▁mme ona ▁kile ▁ambacho ▁hat imaye ▁Bwana ▁alim tende a . ▁Bwana ▁ni ▁mwingi ▁wa ▁huruma , ▁na ▁ame jaa ▁reh ema . </s> swh_Latn
▁Zaidi ▁ya ▁yote , ▁ndugu ▁zangu , ▁ms ia pe , ▁iwe ▁kwa ▁mbingu ▁au ▁kwa ▁dunia , ▁au ▁kwa ▁kitu ▁king ine ▁chochote . ▁" Ndi yo " ▁yenu ▁na ▁iwe ▁ndiyo , ▁na ▁" H apana " ▁yenu ▁iwe ▁hapana , ▁la ▁si vyo ▁m tah uk umiwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Je , ▁mtu ▁yeyote ▁miongoni ▁mwen u ▁ame pat wa ▁na ▁taa bu ? ▁Basi ▁in amp asa ▁a ombe . ▁Je , ▁kuna ▁yeyote ▁mwenye ▁furaha ? ▁Basi ▁na ▁aim be ▁nyimbo ▁za ▁kusi fu . </s> swh_Latn

▁Petro , ▁mtume ▁wa ▁Yesu ▁Kristo : ▁Kwa ▁wate ule ▁wa ▁Mungu , ▁wag eni ▁katika ▁ulimwengu , ▁walio ta wany ika ▁kote ▁katika ▁P onto , ▁Galatia , ▁Kap ad okia , ▁Asia ▁na ▁B ith inia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ni ▁ninyi ▁ambao ▁m lich ag uliwa ▁tangu ▁mwanzo ▁na ▁Mungu ▁Baba ▁kulingana ▁na ▁ali vyot angu lia ▁kuwa jua , ▁kupitia ▁kwa ▁kazi ▁ya ▁utak aso ▁wa ▁Roho , ▁katika ▁uti i fu ▁kwa ▁Yesu ▁Kristo ▁na ▁kuny unyi ziwa ▁damu ▁yake : ▁Ne ema ▁na ▁amani ▁ziwe ▁kwenu ▁kwa ▁wingi . </s> swh_Latn
▁A him idi we ▁Mungu , ▁Baba ▁wa ▁Bwana ▁wetu ▁Yesu ▁Kristo ! ▁Kwa ▁reh ema ▁zake ▁kuu ▁am etu zaa ▁sisi ▁mara ▁ya ▁pili ▁katika ▁tumaini ▁lenye ▁uzima ▁kupitia ▁kwa ▁kufu fuka ▁kwa ▁Yesu ▁Kristo ▁kutoka ▁kwa ▁wafu , </s> swh_Latn

▁Haya ▁yame wa jia ▁ili ▁kwamba ▁imani ▁yenu , ▁iliyo ▁ya ▁thamani ▁kuliko ▁dhahabu ▁ipo te ayo , ▁ingawa ▁hu jari biwa ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁ion ekane ▁kuwa ▁halisi ▁na ▁ima liz ie ▁katika ▁sifa , ▁utukufu ▁na ▁heshima ▁wakati ▁Yesu ▁Kristo ▁at adhi hir ishwa . </s> swh_Latn
